loans.use: to bolster her capital and buy 500 kg of 4ice and 500 kg of beans for resale, to increase her earnings.

loans.name: Bricelda

texts.es: Doña Bricelda se encuentra muy feliz y muy satisfecha ya que gracias a los diferentes inversionistas en KIVA en alianza con la cooperativa COMIXMUL ella invirtió su financiamiento en pago de mano de obra para poder una parte abonar y foliar sus cultivos de café ya existentes y las plantas de café que están pequeñas donde el café esta verde esto para que el producto se mantenga sólido y de buena calidad. Gracias a este financiamiento ella considera fue una puerta que se abrió en el momento justo, porque estaba en condiciones preocupantes para darle el ultimo mantenimiento a su plantación de café lo cual permitió fortalecerla más, dándole una última abonada necesitando sus cultivos este último mantenimiento y por falta de capital no lo había hecho. Muy agradecida con Dios primeramente por permitirle acceder a dichos fondos pues ella pudo salir con su compromiso y nuevamente ella solicita un segundo financiamiento el cual le permitirá invertir en la compra de insumos con los cuales podrá abonar, limpiar y pagar mano de obra para esta nueva temporada.
texts.en:
Bricelda is very happy and very satisfied; thanks to various Kiva lenders in partnership with the cooperative COMIXMUL, she invested her financing in paying for labor to be able to fertilize and tag her pre-existing coffee crops and the coffee plants that are small where the coffee is green so that the product remains solid and good quality. Thanks to this financing she thinks it was a door that opened at the right moment, because she was in precarious conditions for doing the last maintenance on her coffee plantation. Giving her coffee a last round of fertilizer allowed her to fortify her it even more; her crops needed this last maintenance and she hadn't done it due to a lack of capital.

Bricelda is very grateful to God first for allowing her to access these funds, as she was able to get ahead with her commitment. She is again asking for a second loan that will allow her to invest in buying supplies that will enable her to fertilize, clean and pay labor for this new season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor to assist and maintain her coffee crops

loans.name: Nhóm 04 Lớp Nghề Xã Công Liêm Group

texts.en:
Huyền works in agriculture, farming and raising animals to sell. She is applying for a loan to purchase more baby poultry and pigs to raise and sell in the future. 

Huyền is 38 years old and is married with 2 children. Huyền is the group leader of the Nhóm 04 Lớp nghề xã Công Liêm solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. 

This is Huyền's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Huyền has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profits, Huyền hopes for her children to do well in school, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry and pigs to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Nhóm 02,đa Phan,hải Lộc Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phương has a stall selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fruit to resell.

Phương is 26 years old and is married with 3 children.
She is the leader of an 8-member group, the Nhóm 02,Đa Phan,Hải Lộc solidarity group. 

In 2011, Phương joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Phương has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Phương has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Phương hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit to resell.

loans.name: Sreymao's Group

texts.en: Sreymao, a mother of three schoolchildren, is 33 years old and married. She supports her living via rice farming and soybean farming. This is the business that she has had for several years. This is not the first loan for Sreymoa with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely and now her living conditions are getting better than before. Now, in a group of four, she is the leader. For Sreymao, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for the plowing fee and the cost of rice seed and potash. She hopes to boost her crop yield in a timely way so that she can make more income.

loans.use: to pay the plowing fee and the cost of rice seed and potash

loans.name: Fernanado

texts.es: Fernando de 61 años de edad, hombre casado y padre de tres hijos mayores,  desde muy niño trabajó en un taller de soldaduras y allí aprendió toda la técnica que hoy conoce y que hace 30 años lo impulsó a emprender su propio negocio. Hoy es propietario de un taller de soldadura y pintura, lo cual ofrece en el municipio donde habita mediante servicios de prevención o mantenimiento y reparación. Su día laboral inicia desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, con el fin de logar metas futuras, como la de generar empleo y mejorar su vivienda, cumpliendo con su mayor desafío que no es otro que el de incrementar su clientela. En la actualidad ha dado el primer paso mediante la solicitud de un crédito, con el cual planea comprar al por mayor insumos como materiales de soldadura y pintura. Este es su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual mejorará su negocio ganado un poco mas porque le permite comprar en volumen, reduciendo de esta manera sus costos.
texts.en:
Fernando is 61 years old. He is married, and he is the father of three older children. Fernando has worked in a welding working since he was a young boy, and there he learned all of the technique he knows, and that inspired him to start his own business 30 years ago. Today Fernando is the owner of a paint and welding workshop, which offers prevention or maintenance and repair services in the city he lives in.

Fernando's daily workday is from 8am to 6pm, and he works toward achieving his future goals like creating jobs, improving his home, and accomplishing the ultimate goal of increasing his clientele. Currently, Fernando has taken the first step by requesting a loan, with which he plans to buy wholesale supplies such as welding and painting materials. 

This is Fernando's first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and he will use it to improve his business by earning a little more, because it allows him to buy in volume, thereby reducing his costs.

loans.use: buy wholesale welding and painting supplies.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es: Alfonso de 20 años de edad, habita en un municipio cercano a la ciudad de Barranquilla, donde está generando ingresos mediante su oferta de servicios técnicos de mantenimiento y reparación de celulares, desde hace 3 años. Alfonso obtuvo su experiencia, ayudando a un amigo, con el cual aprendió mucho y como le gustó esta actividad, emprendió su propia aventura de negocios; él abre las puertas diariamente desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, comprando de contado en el centro de la ciudad y ofreciendo a sus clientes la posibilidad de adquirir sus servicios de contado y a crédito. Su meta mas adelante, es ubicar un local en su propia casa y un almacén donde ofrecer diversidad de accesorios de celulares y equipos modernos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará repuestos, de diversos modelos, celulares y teclados además de carcazas y otros accesorios, que impactan a su clientela, con esta inversión su negocio mejorará, pues tendrá existencia de artículos que en la actualidad está comprando uno a uno,  cada vez que su cliente lo solicita, y comprando al detalle le genera mas costos, lo cual solucionará con su credikiva.
texts.en:
Alfonso is 20 years old and lives in a town near the city of Barranquilla, where he has earned money through offering technical mobile phone maintenance and repair services for three years. Alfonso gained experience in this by helping a friend, through which he learned a lot and, as he enjoyed this activity, began his own business adventure. 

He opens his doors every day at 9 in the morning until 6 in the evening, buying in cash in the centre of the city and offering his customers the chance to buy his services in cash or on credit. His goal for the future is to set up a shop in his own home and a store where he can offer a range of mobile phone accessories and modern equipment.

He is currently applying for a loan from Kiva. This is his first funding from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, through which he will buy spare parts for various mobile phone models, mobile phones and keypads, covers and other accessories This will affect his customer base. With this investment, his business will improve, as he will have items which at the moment, he has to buy one by one every time a customer requests one, and buying them at retail price results more expensive. His loan from Kiva will resolve this.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for various mobile phone models, mobile phones and keypads, covers and other accessories.

loans.name: Sokhom's Group

texts.en:
Sokhom, 50, lives with family members in a rural village of the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district. She and her husband earn a living through raising pigs, which they both have been doing for more than 20 years to make a living. The current business earns her about KHR 50,000 per day and she can save about KHR 30,000 each day for future needs.

This is the fourth microloan for Sokhom’s group with VisionFund. She is now leading her group to seek a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy more piglets to raise. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise

loans.name: Carlos David

texts.es: Carlos de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica  a la venta de frutas y verduras,  su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Carlos solicita un crédito para la compra de frutas y verduras por mayor, para poder continuar con sus ventas y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is 51 years old and lives with his family in a house that they own. He earns his living selling fruits and vegetables. His business is situated in the market located near his place of residence. With what he earns from his sales, he is able to cover some of the expenses that come up in his household. 

Carlos is requesting a loan for the purchase of fruits and vegetables at wholesale so that he can continue with his sales and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables at wholesale

loans.name: Heang's Group

texts.en:
Heang is aged 62 years and widowed with one child. Residing in a rural village of the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, she and her husband were selling grocery items for more than twenty years to make a living.

Heang’s group consists of two members and they both have been with VisionFund for seven cycles. She successfully used the past loans from VisionFund to better support her living. As the leader, she will use her portion to buy grocery items to resell. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her current business and earn more income for the family to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to resell

loans.name: Run's Group

texts.en:
Run is a 46-year-old married mother, blessed with five children.  She struggles to make a living as a cassava farmer.  Run is not a new borrower to Kiva's partner, VisionFund, and has completely repaid her past loan. 

Run is now leading a group of two to obtain a new loan.  As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy cassava seedlings, pay for plowing fees, and pay labor costs.  She hopes to harvest a better yield than her last crop.

loans.use: to buy cassava seedlings, pay for plowing fees, and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Caserio Yoxaja 1 Group

texts.es:
Mujeres emprendedoras no hacen falta en el país de la eterna primavera que es Guatemala donde la mujer forma parte importante en los campos laborales, tal es el caso de doña Antonia de 28 años de edad que tiene 2 hijo los cuales son estudiantes en la escuela de su comunidad, (Es la de la blusa blanca con flores la que se encuentra a la primera de la derecha a izquierda)
La actividad que ella desempeña con tanto orgullo es la producción de banano en los campos fértiles de su comunidad dicho trabajo lo ha venido realizando desde hace 20 años y genera buena ganancia para la economía de su familia ya que es la herencia que su padre le pudo dejar para que ella tenga una calidad de vida mejor en el futuro.
El uso respectivo que doña Antonia le dará al préstamo que ella solicita es para el mantenimiento de banano  para que produzcan sus frutos y sean llevados en los mercados de la comunidad para su respectiva venta.
Un grupo de mujeres se decidieron unirse con doña Antonia para poder sacarles el provecho máximo de las tierras de su comunidad ya que está llena de vida para producir cualquier producto agrícola.
Los sueños de ella es la plantación de más banano en las tierras fértiles con que ella cuenta y de esa manera ella quiere apoyar al medio ambiente y así mismo sacar un provecho económico para su familia para que lleguen a profesionales en el futuro.
texts.en:
There's no shortage of enterprising women in the country of eternal spring, Guatemala, where women play an important role in countryside work. This is the case of Antonia, who is 28 years old. She has two children, who study at the local school. She is the one in a white blouse with flowers who is the first on the right.

The activity she carries out with so much pride is the production of bananas on the fertile lands of her community. She has been in this business for 20 years and makes a good income for her family. She inherited it from her father, who left it to her so that she could have a better quality of life in the future. 

Antonia will use the loan she is requesting to maintain her banana plants so that they produce their fruits, which can then be taken to the markets of the community to be sold.

A group of women decided to join Antonia to get the most benefit out of the land of her community, since it is full of life to grow any agricultural product. 

Her dream is to plant more banana plants in the fertile land she has and in this way, she wants to support the environment and earn a living from it for her family so that they can become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to look after her banana trees.

loans.name: Nhóm 04, Trung Tâm, Yên Mỹ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phượng works in agriculture raising poultry and pigs. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry and pig to raise and sell in the future.

Phượng is 54 years old and is married with 2 children. She is the leader of a 4-member group, the Nhóm 04, Trung tâm, Yên Mỹ solidarity group. 

In 2011, Phượng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Phượng has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Phượng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Phượng faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Phượng hopes for her children to find a good job, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry and pig to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Sambo's Group

texts.en:
Sambo, a mother of three schoolchildren, and a rice grower, resides in the Battambang province in the Moung Russey district of Cambodia.  She can earn up to 40,000 KHR per day from the business that she has operated for 15 years.  This is the second micro loan for Sambo with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  She has completely repaid her past loan, which has gradually improved her lifestyle.  

Sambo will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her farm.  She hopes to harvest a better yield than her last crop.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her farm.

loans.name: Phy's Group

texts.en:
A mother of five children, Phy is 53 years old and married.  For 27 years she has been a rice and cassava grower residing in the Battambang province of the Moung Russey district in Cambodia.  Phy is not a first time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  She has completely repaid her past loan, allowing her to gradually uplift her lifestyle.  

Phy now leads a group of two obtaining a new loan.  As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, and to pay for plowing fees.  She hopes to harvest a better yield than her last crop.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, and to pay for plowing fees.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 40 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, vive en casa propia en el SEC. EL PALMO I MZ.27 LOT 015, distrito de Cayaltí, Provincia de Chiclayo en la Región de Lambayeque costa norte de Perú.

Rosa se dedica al servicio de transporte en mototaxti, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 4500 nuevos soles para la compra de una nueva mototaxi, dicha inversión le servirá para aumentar su negocio y generar mayores ingresos, lo que incrementará sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is 40 years old and has a partner. She lives in her own home in section El Palmo I MZ.27, lot 015, in the district of Cayaltí, Chiclayo Province, in the region of Lambayeque on the north coast of Peru.

Rosa makes a living in transportation services with a motor-taxi. She has requested a loan of 4500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a new motor-taxi. This investment will help her to grow her business and make more money, which will increase her profits and, ultimately, improve her quality of living.

loans.use: to buy a new motor-taxi.

loans.name: Sokha's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Bovel district of Battambang province, Sokha is 35 years old and married. She is a mother of four dependent kids; two are in school, and two are too young for schooling. To support the need in her household, she grows rice as the main source of income. 

Sokha, who has never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before, teamed up in a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy seed and fertilizer, and to pay for the plowing fee. She hopes to make more income than before.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer, and to pay for the plowing fee.

loans.name: Caserio Yoxaja 2 Group

texts.es:
Mujeres emprendedoras no hacen falta en el país de la eterna primavera que es Guatemala donde la mujer forma parte importante en los campos laborales, tal es el caso de doña Francisca de 30 años de edad que tiene 3 hijo los cuales son estudiantes en la escuela de su comunidad, (Es la que se encuentra en la primera de derecha a izquierda la de blusa color morado)
La  actividad que ella desempeña con tanto orgullo es la producción de banano en los campos fértiles de su comunidad dicho trabajo lo ha venido realizando desde hace 20 años y genera buena ganancia para la economía de su familia ya que es la herencia que su padre le pudo dejar para que ella tenga una calidad de vida mejor en el futuro.
El uso respectivo que doña Francisca le dará al préstamo que ella solicita es para el mantenimiento de banano  para que produzcan sus frutos y sean llevados en los mercados de la comunidad para su respectiva venta.
Un grupo de mujeres se decidieron unirse con doña Francisca  para poder sacarles el provecho máximo de las tierras de su comunidad ya que está llena de vida para producir cualquier producto agrícola.
Los sueños de ella es la plantación de más banano en las tierras fértiles con que ella cuenta y de esa manera ella quiere apoyar al medio ambiente y así mismo sacar un provecho económico para su familia para que lleguen a profesionales en el futuro.
texts.en:
There is no shortage of enterprising women in Guatemala, the country of eternal spring, where women are an important part of the work environment. This is the case with Francisca, who is 30 years old and has three children who are students in the community school. (She is the one in a purple blouse who is first, from right to left.)

The activity that Francisca carries out with such pride is banana production in the fertile fields of her community. She has been doing this work for twenty years and it generates a fair amount of money for her family's finances; it is the legacy her father was able to leave her so that she would have a better quality of life in the future.

Francisca will put to use the loan she is requesting by maintaining her banana trees so that they will produce their fruit, which will be taken to the community markets to be sold.

A group of women decided to join together with Francisca in order to maximize the benefits of the land in their community, as it is full of life for producing any type of agricultural products.

Francisca's dream is to plant more banana trees on the fertile lands that she has; she wants to support the environment in this way, and at the same time, reap a financial benefit for her family so that they can become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to maintain her banana trees

loans.name: Blanca Alicia

texts.es: Doña Blanca de 65 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y honrada, trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pasteles y quesadillas, y sale a venderlo por la colonia donde reside, Doña Blanca solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca is 65 years old and lives with her family in her own home. She is a very responsible, hard-working and honest woman. She works in her own bakery, in which she makes cakes and quesadillas, savoury-filled tortillas, and goes out to sell them in the village in which she lives. 

Blanca is requesting a loan to invest in buying flour, butter, tins and everything else she needs so that she can make more. This improvement project for her bakery is very important for her given that in this way, she will improve her and her family's quality of living.

loans.use: to buy flour, butter, tins and everything else she needs.

loans.name: Guliya

texts.ru: Галия, 57 лет, замужем, есть 2 сына, взрослых и самостоятельных, младший проживает вместе с родителями. У Галии высшее образование, она  учитель-логопед, на протяжении 21 года работает учителем кыргызского языка и литературы в средней школе. У Галии очень хорошие отзывы от соседей и коллег. Они отзываются о ней как о доброй и трудолюбивой женщине. Несмотря на небольшую заработную плату и пенсию, в общем около 14,000 сом (KGS) ежемесячно, Галия смогла начать строительство ее дома. Однако, не хватает средств на внутреннюю и внешнюю отделку и утепление стен, установку пластиковых окон, а также на перекрытие крыши будущего дома. Поэтому Галия обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку металопрофилей, реек и балок для перекрытия крыши и пластиковых окон. Установка энергосберегающих окон позволит снизить расходы на отопление дома, и накопить средства на свадьбу сына. Галия планирует до зимы закончить строительство и отделку дома и переехать в него, так как на сегодняшний день вся ее дружная семья живет в однокомнатной квартире.
texts.en: Guliya is 57 years old and married. Two of her sons are grown and live independently; the youngest one lives with his parents. Galiya has a college degree in education and speech therapy. For 21 years she has been teaching Kyrgyz language and literature in a secondary school. Guliya's neighbors and colleagues speak highly of her, describining her as a kind and hard-working person. In spite of her small salary and pension, in the total amount of about 14,000 KGS per month, Guliya managed to start building a house. However, she lacks the means to pay the for inside and outside wall finishing work and isolation, for installing plastic window frames, and also for roofing in her future home. This is why Guliya has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 50,000 KGS to buy steel profiles, rods and beams needed for roofing and plastic window frames. Installing energy-efficient windows will allow her to lower the heating expenses and save up for her son's wedding. Guliya plans to finish construction work before this winter and move into her new house since as present her close-knit family lives in a studio apartment.

loans.use: to purchase building materials for insulating walls and roof and to buy three energy efficient plastic windows in order for her family to be more secure and conserve energy.

loans.name: Jose Dolores

texts.es: José de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado de su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura con más de veinte años de experiencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos de los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Jose solicita un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, herbicidas, semillas, etc. y para mejorar  terreno que muestra en la fotografía, y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is 33 years old and lives in his own home with his family, made up of his wife and their three children. He makes a living as a farmer and has over twenty years of experience. With the money he makes from his sales, he is able to pay for certain household expenses.

Jose is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, compost, weedkiller, seeds, etc. and to improve the land shown in the photograph, and in this way, be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, weedkiller, seeds, etc. and to improve the land.

loans.name: Voeurn's Group

texts.en: A mother of six children, Voeurn is a villager from Battambang province. She raises cows and works for others for a fee to earn a decent income for the sake of her family. This business earns her about 37,000 KHR per day. She is leading a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to build a barn for her cows. She hopes this loan will support her need on time.

loans.use: to build a barn for her cows.

loans.name: Liderazgo De Mujeres Group

texts.es: El grupo “LIDERAZGO DE MUJERES” está conformada por socias trabajadoras dedicadas a prestar servicios y al comercio minorista. Katherine tiene  30 años de edad es conviviente con 02 hijos dependientes. Ella hace 04 se dedica a la venta de ceviche patasca  cada fin de semana dicha actividad la  aprendió cuando trabajaba con su tía. Y los días de semana trabaja para una empresa como operario de producción. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de utensilios nuevos para su negocio. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. La foto de Katherine se encuentra adjuntada en la parte superior izquierdo. Ella no pudo estar presente en la reunión por motivos laborales.
texts.en:
The “Leadership of Women” [Leadership of Women] group is made up of hard-working members who make a living offering services and in retail. Katherine is 30 years old and has a partner and two dependent children. 

She has made a living selling ceviche and a soup called "patasca" every weekend for four years. She learned this activity when she used to work with her aunt. During the week she works as a production operator. 

She will invest the loan in buying new utensils for her business. The group is grateful to Kiva lenders for the loan they provide. Katherine's photograph is on the top left. She was unable to attend the meeting because of work.

loans.use: to buy new utensils.

loans.name: Lim's Group

texts.en:
A villager from Tbaung Khmum district of Kampong Cham province, Lim is 32 years old and married. She is blessed with five children; three are too young for schooling, and two are in school. 

For the sake of her family, rice cropping and cassava farming are the main businesses. She has been involved in the current business for several years, and it earns her about 27,000 KHR per day. 

This is the original loan for Lim with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and to pay for the plowing fee and weeding fee. She hopes to gain a good yield, better than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for the plowing fee and weeding fee.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Tay's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Tay is 43 years old and a mother of eight children. Nowadays, she needs to support only the four children who remain in school. Cassava farming on one and a half hectares of land is the family's only source of income, which is about 30,000 KHR daily.

Tay is leading a group of two to request a loan. As the leader, she will use her entire portion to pay for plowing, cassava seedlings, insecticides and labor. Tay strongly believes that she can gain a good yield with these expenditures.

loans.use: To pay for plowing, cassava seedlings, insecticides and labor

loans.name: Prom's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Sithor Kandal district of Prey Veng province, Prom is 42 years old and married. She is a breadwinner in the family consisting of three kids, one of whom is in school. She secures the basics in her household via rice farming and Krama weaving. She has been involved in the current business for ages, and it has returned her about 32,000 KHR. 

This is the original loan for Prom with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now in a group of four, she is the leader. Prom will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for the labor cost. She hopes to earn more income to better support her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for the labor cost.

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es:
Adrian vive en casa propia de material rustico, cliente vive con su conyugue y sus dos menores hijos de 10 Y 3 años de los cuales el primero cursa primaria en colegio nacional, cliente cuenta con muy buena referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad la cual se ubica el dsitrito de Pomahauca, provincia de Jaén, departamento de Cajamarca sierra de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Adrian es a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, su terreno está ubicado en el Caserio Patacón - Pomahauca, con una experiencia en el rubro de 8 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agricolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto a un buen precio, lo que le generará mayores ganancias y mejoras en su calidad de vida y la de su famiia.
texts.en:
Adrian lives in his own house, which is made of rustic materials. He lives with his spouse and their two minor children, ages 10 and 3, of whom the first studies at the primary level in the national school. He has many good references, personal as much as work-related, in his community, which is located in the district of Pomahauca, in the province of Jaén, in the department of Cajamarca in the mountains of Peru.

Adrian's work is agriculture, specifically, growing rice. His land is located in the hamlet of Patacón, Pomahauca. He has 8 years of experience in the work. He will use the loan that will be granted to him in his agricultural work, applying and incorporating plant health products and fertilizers, and paying for labor for his harvest. In this way it will help him in the improvement of his crop, physiologically, morphologically, and productively, as will as in having a timely harvest, and in the end he will have better production and better quality of product, and for this reason he will have no problem selling his product at a good price, which will generate better earnings and improvements in his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to apply and incorporate plant health products and fertilizers and pay for labor for his harvest.

loans.name: Nurby

texts.ru: Нурби женщина с прекрасными мыслями и прекрасной душой. Она заботливая мать 4 детей. Ее дети несовершеннолетние. Нурби всегда старается для обеспечения своих детей со всеми необходимыми средствами. Она мечтает, чтобы ее дети получили высшее образование. Она занимается бизнесом. Нурби покупает оптом женскую одежду и реализует в розницу на местном рынке. Она продает женскую одежду соответственно время году. Этим бизнесом она занимается более 10 лет и имеет большой опыт в данной сфере бизнеса. Она хочет обновить ассортимент товара и с такой целью она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки женской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Nurby is a woman with a great mind and good soul. She is the thoughtful mother of four children. Her children are not yet grown-ups. Nurby always strives to provide her children with all things necessary. She dreams that her children will receive higher education. 

Nurby has a business. She purchases women's clothing wholesale and sells them at the local market. She sells womens clothing that fit with the time of the year. She has worked with this business for more than 10 years and has long experience in this area of business. She would like to renew her assortment of goods and with this aim she requests a loan in the amount of 5,000 somoni to purchase women's clothing for the new season. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell for the new season

loans.name: Noeurn's Group

texts.en: A local farmer residing in Kampong Cham province, Noeurn is married and has three children. She grows jicama as her primary source of income and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. This business earns her about 32,000 KHR per day. This is the first loan for Noeurn with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now, she teams up with a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy jicama seed for growing and to pay the plowing fee and labor cost. She strongly believes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: to buy jicama seed for growing and to pay the plowing fee and labor cost

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Mab's Group

texts.en: Mab, a local resident from Kampong Cham province, is 44 years old and married. She is a mother of six children, two of whom are in school. She covers the needs of her household by rice cropping on two hectares of farmland. She has been occupied in her current business for a long time and it currently returns her about 37,500 KHR per day.  Mab has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for past loans with a successful repayment. Now, she leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for replanting. She strongly believes that she can triple her yield from before so that she can make more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed for replanting

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo es el mayor de los hermanos, es el que ayuda a la familia y por recomendación del padre sigue la carrera de técnico electromecánica, sus aspiraciones es poder recibir el título y así poder ayudar más con el ingreso que genera la carrera.
Es una persona que se está esforzando y quiere salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, ya que con ello podrá seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Gerardo is the oldest among his siblings and provides assistance to his family. Based on his father’s recommendation, he is pursuing a degree in order to become an electromechanical technician. His aspirations include receiving his degree so that he can provide more assistance with the income he generates from his career.

Gerardo is a person who strives to move forward and become someone in life. He is requesting a loan so that he can pay his university fees. This will enable him to continue with his work.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Stephany

texts.es: Stephany, joven de 23 años de edad, se dedica a la actividad de comerciante desde hace 4 años, cuando impulsada por un amigo, inició su idea emprendedora, mediante la cual hoy ofrece articulos variados, como bolsos, ropa, calzado accesorios etc, en la  modalidad  de crédito, trabajando todos los dias, desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Sus principales clientes están ubicados alrededor de su vivienda y en sectores muy cercanos a ella; para ellos compra todos los articulos que le solicitan, a través de pedidos, en el mercado de la ciudad de Cartagena, donde encuentra proveedores que le ofrecen los mejores precios. Su meta es lograr ampliar su negocio y a futuro conformar su propio hogar. En la actualidad está aplicando a un  credikiva, primer finaciamiento que hace a la Fundnación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual compará camisetas, bolsos, anillos, collares y pantalones. Todo esto con el fin de incrementar sus inventarios y vender mucho mas, así su credikiva le ayudará a mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: Stephany is a 23-year-old young woman. She has been making a living through her business for 4 years. Motivated by a friend, she started her entrepreneurial idea. Today, she offers various items such as purses, clothes, shoes, accessories, etc., and sells on credit. She works everyday from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. Her main customers are located around her home and in areas very close to her. She purchases all the items her customers request through orders in the Cartagena city market, where she finds vendors who offer the best prices. Her goal is to expand her business and to form her own family in the future. Currently, she is requesting a Credikiva, the first loan she's had from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use it to buy T-shirts, purses, rings, necklaces, and pants in order to increase her inventory and sell a lot more; thus her Credikiva will help her improve her business.

loans.use: to buy T-shirts, purses, rings, necklaces, and pants.

loans.name: Martha De Jesús

texts.es:
Martha de 40 años de  edad, estudio hasta  sexto grado, esta acompañada  su compañero de vida trabaja como ayudante de albañil, de sus 3 hijos solo estudia uno noveno grado, solo sus hijos y su compañero de vida viven con ella.

Martha tiene 20 años de experiencia en su venta de tortillas y una tienda que posee en su casa, este trabajo lo realiza por la misma necesidad de sobrevivir, su trabajo lo hace en su casa donde comienza hacer las tortillas a las 9:00 AM y termina a la 1:00 PM


El préstamo que Martha solicita a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar arroz. Frijoles, azúcar, pan, sal, detergentes, etc. para surtir su tienda y así tener todo lo que los clientes le soliciten para su diario vivir.
 

Martha sueña con ampliar su casa, para que sus hijos tengan mayor privacidad.
texts.en:
Martha is 40 years old. She went to school up to the sixth grade. She is married and her life's companion works as an assistant bricklayer. Of her 3 children, only one is in school, in the ninth grade. Only her children and her husband live with her. 

Martha has 20 years' experience selling tortillas and running a store she has in her house. She does this work out of the need to survive. She works in her house and starts making the tortillas at 9:00 AM and finishes at 1:00 PM.

The loan Martha is asking CREDICAMPO for is to buy rice, beans, sugar, bread, salt, detergents, etc. to stock her store so that she can have everything her customers ask her for for their daily living.
 
Martha dreams of adding on to her house so that her children can have more privacy.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, bread, salt, detergents, etc. to stock her store and have everything her customers ask for for their daily living.

loans.name: Vasil

texts.ru:
Василь торгует спортивной женской одеждой. Имеет собственную торговую точку, торгует сам. Занимается этим бизнесом уже 7 лет. 

Предыдущий кредит в КИВА помог Василию расширить ассортимент весенней спортивной одежды. Он смог получить дополнительную прыбыль. Сейчас Василий просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 23 000 гривен на закупку новых спортивных женских костюмов.
texts.en: Vasil sells women's sports clothing.  He has been working in this business for 7 years, has his own shop, and sells everything himself.  A previous loan from Kiva helped Vasil to expand his inventory of spring sportswear, allowing him to earn extra income.  Vasil is now asking for a loan of 23,000 UAH to purchase new women's sports suits.

loans.use: to purchase women's sportswear

loans.name: Anna

texts.ru:
Анна тогрует на рынке женской обувью уже 10 лет. За это время она приобрела много постоянных покупателей. Ей нравится этот бизнес. Она обслуживает каждого клиента индивидуально, помогая подобрать подходящую обувь по доступной цене.

Благодаря предыдущему КИВА кредиту Анна рассширила ассортимент летней обуви и смогла получить дополнительную прибыль. В этот раз она просит предоставить ей в сумме 40 000 гривен на закупку осенней обуви.
texts.en: Anna has been selling women's shoes at the market for 10 years.  In this time, Anna has accumulated many regular customers.  She enjoys this business - she caters to every client individually, helping him or her to find the right shoes at the right price.  Thanks to a previous loan from Kiva, Anna was able to expand her range of summer shoes, which allowed her to earn extra income.  This time she is asking for a loan of 40,000 UAH to purchase fall shoes.

loans.use: to expand her assortment of fall shoes

loans.name: Las Brisas Group

texts.es: Esta es la Alcancía “Las Brisas” La cual  está constituida por 06 socios responsables y entusiastas. Fanny de 40 años de edad es casada. Fanny se dedica a la venta de comida juntamente con su familia hace más de 05 años. Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo puede seguir apoyando a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Más adelante desea independizarse con el negocio de menú. Con el deseo de seguir mejorando solicito el crédito la cual comprará arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche y de esta manera poder atender a sus comensales. La Alcancía “Las Brisas” agradece a todos los inversionistas Kiva por hacer posible dicho crédito. Fanny es la primera del lado derecho y viste chompa morado.
texts.en: This is the “Las Brisas” bank. It is made up of 6 responsible and enthusiastic members. Fanny is 40 years old and married. Fanny has worked selling food with her family for more than 5 years. Thanks to her work and efforts she can keep helping her husband with the household expenses. In the future, she wants to become independent in the restaurant business. In order to improve, she asked for a loan with which she will buy rice, sugar, pasta, and milk, so she can serve her customers. The “Las Brisas” bank is grateful to all of the Kiva investors for making this loan possible. Fanny is the first on from the right, wearing a purple sweater.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, pasta, and milk so she can serve her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy national wooden bats, trophies, and cases of baseballs that he can sell.

loans.name: Roxana Noemi

texts.es: Roxana de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, desde hace 20 años que se dedica al oficio de corte y confección, tiempo en el cual ha ido adquiriendo mucha experiencia como también clientes fijos. Ella es una persona muy responsable, quien trabaja con mucho esmero por dar lo mejor de sí. Roxana solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir en su negocio, comprando mayor cantidad de materia prima como: telas, botones, hilo, agujas, etc. para poder atender un pedido grande de uniformes con el que cuenta y no perder la oportunidad de obtener ganancias extras para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Roxana is 46 years old and lives with her family in a house that they own. For twenty years, she has earned her living in the sewing field. During that time, she has acquired a great deal of experience as well as regular clients. She is a very responsible person who works painstakingly to give the best of herself. 

Roxana is requesting a loan so that she can invest in her business by buying larger quantities of raw materials like fabrics, buttons, thread, needles, etc. Then she can fill a large uniform order that she has and not miss the opportunity to obtain extra earnings in order to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, buttons, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for jokes and toys to make his magic shows much more interesting.

loans.name: Víctor Steven

texts.es:
Víctor nos da la bienvenida a su negocio con una cálida sonrisa, mostrándonos amablemente su primer negocio de joyería, emprendido desde hace ocho años, cuando se convirtió en padre por primera vez. Todo inició en el 2006, cuando era trabajador de una joyería y donde ahorró para establecer su propio negocio. 
Sin haber ido a la universidad, este joven emprendedor ha ido luchando para salir adelante. A sus 31 años, este comerciante es caracterizado por sus joyas de alta calidad. No tiene otro ingreso más que su negocio, por lo que necesita de un préstamo para comprar anillos, aretes, collares, pulseras, dijes, entre otros tipos de joyerías de mayor demanda, para complacer a sus clientes. Esto le ayudará a crecer como él siempre ha soñado, ahorrar y poder comprar un taxi para poder tener otros ingresos.
texts.en:
Víctor welcomes everyone who comes to his business with a warm smile. In a friendly manner, he shows off his first jewelry business that he started eight years ago when he became a father for the first time. This all started in 2006, when he was a jewelry store employee. He had saved up money in order to establish his own business.

Without having attended university, this young entrepreneur is striving to get ahead. At 31 years of age, this merchant is known for offering jewelry of high quality. Other than his business, Víctor has no additional source of income. For this reason, he needs a loan in order to buy rings, earrings, necklaces, bracelets, pendants, and other types of jewelry that are in high demand so that he can please his customers.

This will help him to grow since he has always dreamed of saving up toward the purchase of a taxi so that he can have extra income.

loans.use: to buy rings, earrings, necklaces, bracelets, pendants, and other types of jewelry.

loans.name: Vitaliya

texts.ru:
Виталия  замужем. У нее есть семнадцатилетняя дочь.  Виталия имеет свой бизнес.

Виталия занимается выездной торговлей по селам. Он продает одежду, обувь для работы на огороде, постельное белье. Виталия использует свой автомобиль для работы. Она спокойный доброжелательный и ответственный человек. Виталия всегда старается выбирать товар, на который будет спрос. Часто она привозит конкретному покупателю товар на заказ.

Виталия просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 40 000 гривен на закупку школьной одежды, обуви и канцтоваров.  Кредит поможет увеличить доход семьи.
texts.en: Vitaliya is married and has a 17-year old daughter.  Vitaliya has her own business - she travels from village to village, selling various items.  She sells clothes, shoes for work and for gardening, and bedding.  Vitaliya uses her own car for work.  She is a peaceful, friendly, and responsible person.  She always tries to pick goods for which there will be demand.  Often, she brings specific goods to clients to order.  Vitaliya is asking for a loan of 40,000 UAH to purchase school clothes, shoes, and stationary.  This loan will help increase her family's income.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of school clothes and supplies

loans.name: Yofana

texts.es: Yofana de 40 años, genera sus principales ingresos alquilando máquinas para lavar o lavadora. Ella tiene 13 años de experiencia en su negocio, el cual inició cuando observó la potencialidaqd de su vecindad, quienes tenian la necesidad de obtener este servicio. Yofana trabaja diariamente desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde y tiene como meta incrementar sus ingresos, adquieriendo hasta 40 lavadoras, para en un futuro comprar su propia casa, con el aumento de su productividad. En la actualidad su oferta de servicios es atendida por sus vecinos, especialmente mujeres; Yofana promueve su negocio mediante una atención de calidad y avisos publicitarios que ubica en su negocio. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer finacimeinto que hace a la Fundación mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará 4 lavadoras, que incrmentarán su servicio y aumentarán su capacidad de respuesta a su clientela, mejorando su negocio con esta inversión.
texts.en:
Yofana is 40 years old and generates her primary earnings from renting out washing machines. She has 13 years of experience in her business, which she started when she saw the potential among her neighbors, who needed to obtain this service. Yofana works every day from 8 in the morning to 6 in the evening and her goal is to increase her earnings, acquiring up to 40 washing machines in order to buy her own house in the future with the increase in her productivity. She currently provides her service to neighbors, especially women.

Yofana promotes her business by means of quality customer service and advertisements that are located at her business. She us currently applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing she has requested from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With this loan she will buy four washing machines, which will increase her service and increase her capacity to respond to her customer base, improving her business with this investment.

loans.use: to buy four washing machines

loans.name: Yary's Group

texts.en:
Yary, 26, is from a rural village located in the Ek Pnhom district of Battambang province. She is married with three children. She and her husband earn a living through raising chickens. They have been in this business for ten years. The current business earns her family about 50,000 KHR per day.
Yary has been with VisionFund for two cycles and now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy more chickens for resale. She hopes to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy more chickens for resale

loans.name: Paridakan

texts.ru: Паридакан, 58 лет, вдова, мать 3 детей, все дети взрослые, семейные, у Паридакан уже много внуков. Семья дружная и активно помогают по хозяйству. Образование у Паридакан среднее, на протяжении 25 лет занимается сельским хозяйством- животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с нуля. На сегодняшний день ежемесячный доход ее семьи составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Паридакан, на сегодняшний день она имеет развитое хозяйство: 4 коровы, 20 овец и 1,20 ГА земельной доли, на которой Паридакан выращивает клевер и ячмень. Прибыль от бизнеса и накопленный средства позволили Паридакан начать строительство дома, однако не хватает средств на его завершение и постройку времянки, поэтому Паридакан обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку цемента, досок и пластиковых окон, что позволит ей в будущем экономить на оплате за  отопление. Сэкономленные средства она планирует направить на увеличение поголовья скота с дальнейшим откормом и перепродажей.
texts.en: Paridakan is 58 years old and widowed.  She is the mother of three children, all of whom are grown and have families of their own.  Paridakan already has many grandchildren.  Her family is friendly and actively helps her manage her affairs.  Paridakan has a secondary education.  For 25 years she has worked in animal husbandry and agriculture, starting her business from scratch.  Thanks to Paridakan's hard work, her business has grown to include: 4 cows, 20 sheep, and 1.20 hectares of land, on which Paridakan grows clover and barley.  Her family's monthly income is about 20,000 KGS.  Income from her business, as well as saved funds, allowed Paridakan to begin building a house.  However, she lacks the money to complete the project.  For this reason, Paridakan turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase, cement, planks, and plastic windows, which will help her save money on heating in the future.  She plans to put her future savings towards increasing her number of cattle with further fattening and reselling.

loans.use: To purchase energy efficient plastic windows in order to conserve energy, also to buy cement and boards to finish construction on her house

loans.name: Choery

texts.en:
Choery is a 59-year-old mother of two living in a rural village of the Moung Russey district, Cambodia. To make a living, she and her husband farm rice and work for others. The current business earns her about 29,000KHR per day.  

This will be Choery's first microloan with VisionFund. She will use it to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Jose Matias

texts.es: Jose Matias es conductor de maquinaria pesada para la Municipalidad de Juigalpa, su esposa sale a vender a diario ropa nueva de forma ambulante y de esta manera ayuda con los gastos del hogar ambos han sacado adelante a sus hijos que ya son mayores de edad y dependen por si solos, Don Jose asume el gasto de su pequeña nieta la que esta a su cargo.  Tiene la necesidad de Construir un porche en la parte delantera de su vivienda de esta manera brindar mayores condiciones a su familia y es una manera también de dar protección y presentación a su vivienda que solo lo lograra con el Financiamiento solicitado y sudor de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Jose Matias is a heavy machine operator for the City of Juigalpa. His wife sells new clothes every day as a street vendor. This is how both of them contribute toward the household expenses and helped their children get ahead. However, the children are now adults and no longer dependent on them. Don Jose is now assuming the expenses of his young granddaughter since she is under his care.

Jose needs to build a porch at the front of his house, which will provide better conditions for his family. The porch will also provide protection and improve the appearance of his house. The only way he can achieve this is by requesting a loan and through the sweat of his work.

loans.use: to build a porch at the front of his house.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат единственная кормилица 4 детей, так как год назад она развелась с мужем и живет с детьми. Она работает в течение нескольких лет в заводе. Мухаббат и ее дети живут бедно. Ее старший сын трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и помогает маме по обеспечению семьи. Ее второй сын в этом году окончил среднюю школу и поступил в университет. Мухаббат очень хочет, чтобы ее сын получил высшее образование. Однако, Мухаббат не имеет денег для оплаты учебного договора. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muhabbat is the main breadwinner for her four children, as she and her husband divorced a year ago and she lives with the children.  She has worked in a factory for a few years and lives on a low income.  Her eldest son is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation and helps his mother take care of the family.  Her next eldest son finished high school this year and was accepted at university.  Muhabbat very much wants her son to receive a higher education, but she doesn't have enough money to pay his tuition.  She is asking for a loan of 4,000 somoni to pay for his tuition.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her son's education

loans.name: Maria Javier

texts.es: María, tiene 45 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 1 hijo, y reside en el  municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Tiene como negocio una pulpería donde vende carnes, refrescos, lácteos, granos básicos, jabón, huevos, churros, etc., este negocio lo tiene hace 3 años en su casa y es su fuente de ingresos. Ha solicitado el sexto ciclo de  préstamo que es por 6,000 lempiras, este préstamo lo invertirá en surtir mas el negocio con productos como refrescos, lácteos, carnes, arroz, frijoles, golosinas, y otros abarrotes para mantener siempre surtido el negocio y hacerlo crecer mas.
texts.en:
María is 45 years old and in a common-law relationship with her partner. They have one child. She resides in the town of Choloma, Cortes.

María has a grocery business where she sells meat, soft drinks, dairy products, basic grains, soap, eggs, snack foods, and other items. She has been operating this business out of her house for the past three years and it serves as her source of income.

María is requesting her sixth loan in the amount of 6,000 HNL. The money will be invested in more inventory for her business such as soft drinks, dairy products, meats, rice, beans, snack foods, and groceries. This will always keep her business stocked so that she can make it grow more.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, dairy products, meats, rice, beans, snack foods, and other products.

loans.name: Anabel

texts.es:
Anabel tiene 19 años de edad, es estudiante del 1er año de la carrera de Medicina, vive con sus padres, quienes son docentes, tiene hermanos menores, ella es la mayor.
Ella desea estudiar y desea ser doctora en  Clínica Médica, dice que es una carrera bastante difícil y costosa por lo que su padre le está ayudando por el momento, pero piensa encontrar trabajo en un hospital más adelante para ganar experiencia y costear sus estudios ella misma. Los gastos además de las cuotas son elevados por lo que solicita el préstamo quiere poder cubrirlos por medio de este.
texts.en:
Anabel is 19 years old and a first-year student working toward a degree in Medicine. She lives with her parents who are teachers. Anabel has younger siblings, but she is the oldest.

She wants to study in order to become a Doctor of Clinical Medicine. Anabel says that her degree program is both difficult and expensive, but her father is helping her at the moment. In order to get a future job at a hospital, she will need to gain experience and pay for her studies herself. The cost of her fees keeps rising, so she is requesting a loan in order to have this expense covered.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Galina

texts.ru: Галине 39 лет, разведена, мать 2 детей школьного возраста. У Галины средне-специальное образование. С 2005 года занимается животноводством и птицеводством, мастер в своем деле. По хозяйству активно помогает вся семья.  В хозяйстве Галины есть 3 бычка, 15 овец, 70 породистых кур и 300 цыплят. Она продает круглый год яйца, на вырученные деньги приобретает корм для скота. Также Галина печет булочки на заказ, распределяя их по магазинам. Ежемесячная прибыль Галины составляет 15,000 сом(KGS). В целях увеличения поголовья скота, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 150,000 сом(KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и расширения сарая для содержания скота.
texts.en: Galina is 39 years old and divorced with two school-aged children.  She has a specialized technical education.  Since 2005, she has worked in raising livestock and chickens, and she is a master in her field.  Her family actively helps her around the farm, which includes three bulls, 15 sheep, 70 pedigreed hens and 300 chickens.  Galina sells eggs all year round, and she uses the egg money to buy feed for the animals.  She also bakes bread rolls to order and sells them to shopkeepers.  Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS).  With the goal of increasing her head of livestock, Galina has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy one cow and to expand her barn.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and expand her barn.

loans.name: Andrw Damian

texts.es:
Andrw es un joven campesino de 19 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. 

Esto le ha permitido progresar y, hoy en día posee cultivos de zanahoria y arveja, cultivos que atiende todos los días y las cosechas son vendidas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Sonsón que es donde actual mente vive junto con sus padres, adicionalmente, realiza labores de jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región, pues con ello complementa los ingresos con los que vela por el bienestar de sus padres que tanto lucharon para sacarlo adelante. 

Con el apoyo del crédito comprará insumos agrícolas al por mayor como abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes, semillas de zanahoria y arveja, entre otros, con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha, mucho más productiva, con lo que mejorará los ingresos a la hora de vender sus productos.

Andrw, con su espíritu emprendedor, su pujanza y tenacidad, quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca propia, en la que pueda cultivar mucha más variedad de productos y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio.

¡ayuda a este joven campesino y emprendedor Colombiano con este prestamo!
texts.en:
Andrw is a hardworking and humble 19 year old farmer who learned as a child all about working in the field, thanks to instruction from his parents. This has allowed him to progress and today he has crops of carrots and peas that he attends to every day, selling the crops at the marketplace in Sonsón where he currently lives with his parents. He also works as a day laborer on various farms in the area, as this augments the income he uses to look after the wellbeing of his parents as they struggled so hard to get ahead.

With the help of the loan he will buy agricultural supplies in bulk such as compost, pesticide, fertilizer, carrot and pea seeds, and more, and with this he will continue caring for his crops and will have a better harvest, being much more productive and improving his earnings when he sells his crops.

Andrw, with his entrepreneurial spirit, his strength and tenacity, wants to continue fighting to fulfill his dream of having his own farm, where he can grow a larger variety of products and thus improve the profitability of his business.

“Help this young and enterprising Colombian farmer with this loan!”

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, carrot and pea seeds, irrigation and supplies to prepare the land that will allow him to obtain higher earnings in order to help his parents.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru:
Шухрат жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 38 лет. Он женат и имеет 2-их детей. Он обратился в Арванд не впервые, за возможностью получить финансовую поддержку. Шухрат добросовестный наш клиент. Погашает кредит своевременно без просрочек.  Сам Шухрат живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. У него имеется  среднее специальное образование. Жена Шухрата не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Шухрат работает по своей профессии. Он тракторист. Он пашет на своем тракторе поля, удобряет урожай минералами и т.д.  От данного дела он получает хороший доход.  Сейчас Шухрат хочет отремонтировать свой большой дом. Хочет сделать его уютным и красивым. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для  ремонта своего дома. Шухрат очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Shuhrat is a cheerful and hardworking man of 38.  He is married and has two children.  This is not the first time he has turned to Arvand for financial support.  He is a conscientious client, and repays his loans on time and without delinquency.  Shuhrat lives with his family in a rural area.  He has a secondary, specialized education.  Shuhrat's wife does not have a higher education - financial difficulties in the family prevented her from having the opportunity to study at university.  She is a homemaker, and works around the house and raises the children.  In order to have money for food, Shuhrat works by driving a tractor.  He plows fields and fertilizes them with minerals, etc.  He makes a good living from this business.  Shuhrat now wants to remodel his large home - he wants to make his house cozy and beautiful.  For this reason he turned to Arvand in hopes of receiving a loan to purchase building materials for the remodel.  Shuhrat is hoping for a positive outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Aigul

texts.ru: Айгул, 58 лет, не замужем, есть 1 сын, который с радостью помогает по хозяйству. У Айгул высшее образование и большой трудовой стаж. Сейчас на пенсии, однако из-за маленького размера пенсии, ей 4 года назад пришлось искать дополнительный заработок, так в 2010 году Айгул стала заниматься животноводством, накопив на старт сумму в 6,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Айгул на сегодняшний день у нее есть 1 стельная корова и 2 овцы. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет всего около 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айгул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 28,000 сом (KGS) на покупку сена и корма для скота, часть средств направит на ремонт сарая. Из-за катастрофически низких доходов Айгул хотела сдать скот, чтобы приобрести корм, однако произведя расчеты, поняла, что это не выгодно и прибыль от бизнеса снизится еще больше, поэтому Айгул и обратилась в Банк. Айгул планирует расширить ее бизнес и накопить средства на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Aigul is 58 years old and she is married with one son, who gladly helps her around the house.  Aigul has a higher education and a wide work experience.  She is now a pensioner, but because of her small pension, she had to find an additional source of income four years ago.  So in 2010, she began to raise livestock, which she started with a sum of 6,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, Aigul now has one calf and two sheep.  Her monthly income is about 6,000 som (KGS).  With the goal of developing her business further, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 28,000 som (KGS) to buy hay and feed for her livestock and to make repairs on her barn.  Because of her catastrophically low income, Aigul had wanted to sell off her livestock to buy food, but she did a bit of accounting and realized that it would not make good business sense, as her income would drop even further.  For this reason, she has gone to the bank.  She plans to expand her business and save up for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to purchase hay and feed, and also to make repairs to her barn in order to expand her business and increase her income

loans.name: Reyes Zulema

texts.es: Doña Reyes, tiene 42 años de edad, ella tiene una relación en  unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 3 hijos y reside con su esposo e hijos en el municipio Yoro. Siempre se ha dedicado a realizar actividades agrícolas. Tiene unas vacas para destazo y venta de carne y producción de leche, también, tiene cultivo de maíz y frijol. Doña Reyes cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo para estas actividades ya que es su fuente de ingresos. Está solicitando un préstamo por 21,000 lempiras para comprar una vaca para la producción de leche y aumentar la producción y su ganado. Su plan es tener más ingresos para darles mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en: Reyes is 42 years old. She is in a common-law marriage with her husband, with whom she has 3 children. She lives with her husband and children in the municipality of Yoro. She has always been working in agriculture. She has a few cows to butcher and sell their meat and dairy cows. She also has corn and bean crops. Reyes has her husband's support for these activities since it's their source of income. She is requesting a loan for 21,000 Honduran lempiras to buy a dairy cow and to increase milk production and the number of livestock. Her plan is to have more income to give a better education to her children.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and to increase production and her income.

loans.name: Feruza

texts.ru:
Фируза родилась и выросла в сельской местности. С детства она  приучена к труду. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей.  Фируза  занимается животноводством .  Как и у всех жителей сельской местности в её хозяйстве есть и скот и барашки. Кроме этого она еще преподает в школе. Её муж Бозорбой недавно уехал в Россию на заработки.  Так как растут дети и дом надо достроить,  и расходы на образование на всё нужны денежные средства. Фируза со своим мужем  усердно работают ради благополучие семьи . Фируза  очень трудолюбивая  женщина. Она после работы сразу же берется,  за дело,  начинает ухаживать за скотами откармливает их, ведь благодаря животноводству у них жизнь налаживается в лучшую сторону. 
 Фируза хотела бы отремонтировать свой не достроенный дом, установить пластиковые окна и двери. Не зря она хочет установить эти окна, пластиковые окна в доме сохраняет теплоту, что не мало важную роль играет для жителей села,  не пропускает пыль в дом и конечно без шума. Фирузе для установки окон и дверей своих накопленных денег не хватает.  Поэтому   за помощью она обратилась в «Арванд». Фируза  очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Feruza was born and raised in a rural region. She is married and has two children.   Since childhood she has been accustomed to work, and now works in animal husbandry.  Like everyone who lives in her rural area, her business is in cattle and sheep.  Additionally, she teaches school.  Her husband, Bozorboy, recently moved to Russia for work because their children are growing up and they need money to finish their house and pay for schooling.  Feruza and her husband work very hard for the good of their family - Feruza is a very hardworking woman.  As soon as she finishes work, she begins looking after the cattle and feeding them because, thanks to their work in livestock, their lives are improving.  Feruza would like to repair her unfinished house, and put in plastic windows and doors.  It is no wonder Feruza wants to install these windows - plastic windows keep heat in the house; additionally, they keep out dust and noise.  Feruza does not have sufficient funds for these windows and doors, and thus turned to "Arvand" for help.  Feruza is hopeful of a positive outcome, and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Sreyven's Group

texts.en:
Sreyven, 33, is the married mother of two children living in a rural village of the Choeng Prey district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. Rice farming is the main source of her family’s income, and her husband supplements that income by working for others for a fee. The current business earns her about 40,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Sreyven’s group consists of two members who are female and in the same village. She is in her loan cycle with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, and she has completely repaid her past loan, which enabled her to better support her family and have some money. Now leading her group of two to apply for a loan, Sreyven will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes that this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sarom's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural area located in the Moung Russey district where rice farming is a common way to earn a living, Sarom is aged 33 years and married. As a mother, she has struggled to feed her three children by farming rice. Having been in the business for 11 years, she earns approximately 30,000 KHR per day from the business. 

Sarom has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for six cycles and she completely paid back the loans. Now she is leading her group of two to apply for another loan. She wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to make more income so as to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Neang's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of the Choeung Prey district, Neang is aged 44 years and married with five children. The main sources of the family’s income are from rice farming and working for others for a fee which she and her husband have been doing for 25 years to make a living. 

Neang has been with VisionFund for one cycle. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan. She is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and use part of it to buy gasoline for a water pump to carry water into the rice field. She hopes to make more income so as to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sokhorn's Group

texts.en:
A mother of three dependent children, one schoolchild and two under-school-aged kids, Sokhorn is 32 years old and is a local farmer from Kampong Cham province where her rice is grown. Besides this agricultural business, she works for others for a fee to better her income. She is able to earn up to 38,900 KHR per day from the business that she has had for 14 years. 

This is the second loan for Sokhorn with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has repaid her past loan completely. Now, in a group of two, she is the leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her crop. She hopes to gain a better yield than before so that she can make more income to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed for her crop

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Phalla's Group

texts.en:
A rural villager from the Cheung Prey District, Phalla is 43 years old and married. She has four children and works as a rice farmer. To supplement her family’s income, Phalla sells grocery items and food. She and her husband have been in this business for twenty-five years and earn about 47,000 KHR daily. 

This is Phalla's second microloan with VisionFund. Now, she is group loan leader. As the leader, she is going to use her loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to produce more crops and better her living situation.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Iroda

texts.ru: Ирода молодая женщина в возрасте 29 лет. Она очень добрая и трудолюбивая. Ирода замужем, имеет двоих детей. Ирода родилась и выросла в селе, где дети с детства приучаются к труду. Ирода после замужества переехала жить в район. Муж Ироды Низомиддин работает в России. Сама Ирода в течение шести лет занимается торговлей, она продает не дорогие женские и мужские обуви на рынке. Так как Ирода стремительная девушка она справляется со всеми делами, и с домашними и с воспитанием детей, а также с маленьким бизнесом. У нее достаточно клиентов, хорошее место. Ирода хочет расширять свой бизнес, разнообразить виды товаров. Ведь у нее место хорошее и она думает, что трудности в торговле не будет. Но Ироде для покупки и привозки товаров не хватает денежных средств и она, подумав, обратилась в МДО Арванд за финансовой помощью. Ирода очень надеется на поддержку организации и заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Iroda is a young woman of 29.  She is very kind and hardworking.  Iroda is married and has two children.  Iroda was born and grew up in a village where children from childhood are accustomed to hard work.  After her wedding, Iroda moved to her current home.  Iroda's husband, Nizomidine, works in Russia.  Iroda has been working in sales for six years.  She sells inexpensive women's and men's shoes at the market.  Iroda is able to meet all of her responsibilities, including those in the home and related to raising her children, as well as those associated with her small business.  She has a sufficient number of clients, and her shop is in a good location.  Iroda hopes to expand her business and diversify the goods that she sells.  Because she has such an advantageous location, she does not think that there will be any difficulties in selling her products.  However, Iroda lacks sufficient funds to purchase new goods.  For this reason, she has turned to Arvand for financial help.  Iroda is hoping for support and expresses her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Sinat

texts.en:
Originally from a village of Kampong Cham province’s Prey Chor district, Sinat is aged 39 years and married with three children. For more than 15 years, she and her husband have been farming rice as the primary source of the family’s income and they can earn about KHR 66,000 per day and manage to save about 20,000 KHR each day for future needs. 

Sinat has been a member of VisionFund for four cycles already and she wisely and successfully used the first loans to make her living conditions better. She is going to use this loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. This loan will enable her to extend her farmland to increase her rice farming production to grow more rice and improve her family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Hy

texts.en:
Aged 39 years, Hy is married and lives with her family in a rural area located in Cheung Prey district of Kampong Cham province. She earns a living through farming rice which she had been in for 21 years, while her husband is a paid construction worker to help support the family. Together, she and her husband can earn about KHR 27,000 per day from the current business and are able to save about KHR 10,000 each day for the future. 

This is the first loan for Hy with VisionFund. Now she is applying for a loan to buy a pumping machine for carrying water into her farmland. She hopes to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy a pumping machine

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Suyapa

texts.es: Doña Suyapa es una mujer emprendedora y muy luchadora la cual agradece los diferentes apoyos financieros que ha recibido desde Mayo del 2013 para poder dar asistencia y mantenimiento a sus cultivos de café.
