Estos han ayudado a crecer y fortalecer su tierra, cosecha, ingresos familiares y demás de una manera pacífica y sin preocupaciones. Su primer financiamiento lo utilizo para compra de insumos agrícolas que ayudaron a dar protección y mantenimiento a sus cultivos de café ya que para ese momento la roya se propagaba muy rápido entre los diferentes cultivos y dañando los de muchos productores a la vez. Su segundo financiamiento fue solicitado también para el mismo rubro de manera que este fue invertido en la asistencia ya que después del corte del grano las plantas quedaron deterioradas y maltratadas obteniendo al final de la cosecha muy buenas ganancias sobre sus cultivos de café los cuales vendió a muy buen precio en el mercado a pesar de la baja del mismo. En esta ocasión solicita nuevamente pueda ser apoyada por los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma de KIVA para poder comprar los insumos necesarios y asistir sus cultivos de café ya que están en proceso de producción en esta nueva temporada.
texts.en:
Suyapa is a very tenacious and enterprising woman.  She is grateful for the different loans that she has received since May of 2013 in order to be able to care for and maintain her coffee crops.  They have helped to grow and strengthen her land, the harvest, and the family income in a peaceful way without worries.

She used her first loan to buy agricultural supplies that helped protect and maintain her coffee crops.  In that time the rust was propagating very rapidly among the different crops and damaging the crops of many producers.

Her second loan was also requested for the care of the crops because after the pruning, the plants were left poorly treated and deteriorated.  She did get good income from her coffee crops, which she sold for a very good price in the market in spite of the drop in the market.

This time she is again requesting support from the different Kiva lenders to be able to buy the needed supplies and care for her coffee crops.  This is because they are in the production process in this new season.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Zafar

texts.ru:
Зафар жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 37 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку. Сам Зафар живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Зафара также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Зафар занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Также Зафар подрабатывает мастером. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Зафару в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота. Сейчас Зафар хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Зафар очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Zafar is a cheerful and hardworking man of 37.  He is married and has two children.  He first turned to Arvand when he learned that he had a chance to receive financial assistance.  Zafar lives with his family in a village.  He does not have a higher education because, due to financial difficulties in his family, he never had the chance to study at university.  Zafar's wife also lacks an education.  She is a homemaker, and works around the house and raises the children.  In order to earn money for food, Zafar runs his own business fattening and selling cattle.  Zafar also works as a handyman.  From his business he receives a good income.  Zafar's wife also helps with the business by selling milk from the cattle.  Zafar now hopes to expand his business by increasing his number of cattle.  In hopes of receiving a loan to purchase cattle, Zafar turned to Arvand for help.  Zafar is hopeful of a positive outcome, and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Puch's Group

texts.en:
Puch, 58, lives in a rural village in Banteay Meanchey Province’s Moungkul Borey District in Cambodia. She is married and has four children. For the last thirty-seven years, Puch has been farming rice and raising chickens. She earns about 26,000 KHR per day.

Puch is just with VisionFund for this cycle. She is the leader of a loan group. As the leader, she is going to use her loan portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and buy chicken feed. Puch hopes to produce more crops and fatten her chickens. Ultimately, she wants to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Edward

texts.es: Desde hace 17 años, cuando Edward estudió artes Plasticas y terminó su carrera, decidió emprender su propio negocio. El habita con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 26 y 18, en un barrio cerca a las playas del municipio donde tambien se encuentra su taller. Los principales productos de su oferta, son esculturas, mueblería, entre otras artesanias,  producto de su inmensa creatividad, que elabora a la medida de las solicitudes de su clientela. Edward vende a crédito y de contado, a una clientela que ha captado desde que inició su negocio y para ellos trabaja durante 12 horas diarias todos los dias. Su meta mas adelante es orghanizar su taller, teniendo empleados y lograr que sus hijos  lleguen a ser profesionales. Su mayor desafio es incrementar su clientela y para generar mayor productividad, está aplicando a un credikiva, primer finacimeto que hace a la Fundación mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará: aluminio, super board y resina. Con esta inversión podrá manejar sus ventas sin solicitar anticipo a su clientela y esto es justamente lo que hace que su negocio mejore.
texts.en:
Edward decided to start his own business 17 years ago, when he completed his degree in Plastic Arts.  He lives with his spouse and his two children, ages 26 and 18, in a neighborhood near the beach in the municipality where his workshop is also located. 

The principal products that he offers are sculptures and furniture, along with other handmade objects that are the product of his enormous creativity. He makes them to order, according to his customers' requests. Edward sells on credit and for cash, to a clientele that he has had since he started his business; and it is for them that he works 12 hours a day, every day. 

His future goal is to organize his workshop, have employees, and ensure that his children become professionals.  

His biggest challenge is to increase his customer base; and in order to generate greater productivity, he is applying for a Kiva loan. This is the first financing that he is obtaining from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo; and with it he will purchase aluminum, super board, and resin. With this investment he will be able to handle his sales without requesting an advance payment from his customers; and this is exactly what will make his business improve.

loans.use: to purchase aluminum, super board, and resin.

loans.name: Zhanylbubu

texts.ru: Жанылбубу 53 года, замужем, мать 3 детей, образование высшее, на протяжении 25 лет работает секретарем в сельскохозяйственном управлении. Также много лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. В 2011 году дом Жанылбубу  пострадал от наводнения и был непригоден для проживания, семья Жанылбубу  накопила средства на строительство нового дома, на сегодняшний день осталось сделать внутреннее утепление и внешнюю отделку стен дома, поэтому Жанылбубу  и обратилась в  Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку пеноплекса (материала для утепления), штукатурки и прочего. Завершив строительство дома, Жанылбубу планирует начать строительство сараев для скота.
texts.en: Zhanylbubu is 53, married, and the mother of 3 children.  She has a higher education and has worked for 25 years as a secretary in agricultural management.  She has also worked for many years in animal husbandry and agriculture.  In 2011, Zhanylbubu's home was damaged by floods and was no longer habitable.  Zhanylbubu's family saved money to build a new house, and now all that remains is to insulate and finish the external walls of the house.  Zhanylbubu turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 60,000 KGS to purchase plenoplex (material for insulation), plaster, and other items.  Once her home is completed, Zhanylbubu plans to begin building sheds for cattle.

loans.use: To insulate the walls of her new house after her old home was damaged by floods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to care for her coffee crops during this new season.

loans.name: G.s El Porvenir Group

texts.es:
El señor Eduardo tiene 69 años de edad, es padre de 3  hijos vive con su esposa en su casa de habitación, su actividad principal es la ganadería, caficultura y también es un intermediario de café muy fuerte en la zona,  es una persona muy reconocida por su trayectoria de trabajo y por su honradez, cuenta con más de 35 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad económica.
Don Eduardo esta solicitado el préstamo para la compra de una planta solar para su vivienda porque en comunidad no hay servicio de luz eléctrica, espera que esta inversión le contribuya a mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia y a su vez le permita cumplir sus sueños de tener luz en su hogar.
Don Eduardo uno de sus sueños es darle una buena educación profesional a sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones de vida su familia y con el apoyo que reciba del préstamo le contribuirá a lograr sus sueños y también con la obtención de esta planta solar espera contribuir al cuidado del medio ambiente al igual que sus compañeros de grupo.
Doña Yadira se dedica a la ganadería desde hace varios años.
Don Santos Alonso se dedica a la ganadería y caficultura.
Don Santos Bernabe se dedica a la ganadería y la caficultura.

 Trojes, Honduras Julio 2014
texts.en:
Eduardo is 69 years old. He is the father of three children and lives at home with his wife. His main activity is coffee growing and he is also an active coffee broker in the area. He is a well known person in his field of work, and for his honesty, with more than 35 years dedicated to this type of economic activity.

Eduardo is asking for a loan to buy a solar energy system for his home because in his community there is no electricity service. He hopes that this investment will help improve his quality of life a bit and that of his family and at the same time fulfill his dream of having light in his home.

One of Eduardo’s dreams is to provide a good professional education for his children and to improve living conditions for his family and the help he receives from the loan will help him towards achieving his dreams and also with the solar energy system he hopes to contribute to the environment as the other members of the group do.

Yadira has been raising livestock for some years.

Santos Alonso works in livestock and coffee production.

Santos Bernabe works in livestock and coffee production.

Trojes, Honduras  -  July 2014

loans.use: to buy a solar energy system for his house

loans.name: Francisco Pedro

texts.es:
Las calles de Sololá es testigo de los colores más vistosos impregnados en los tejidos artesanales.  Es imposible que cualquier turista deje de admirar este producto, pararse y hacer una buena compra de ello. De 43 años de edad casado don Francisco es un ejemplo en tener vivos las culturas de nuestro país Guatemala, el tiene  tres hijos de 14, 10 y 7 años de edad los cuales son estudiantes en la escuela cerca de su comunidad.

La actividad que el dignamente realiza es tejido artesanal el lo ha venido realizando desde hace mas de 12 años ya que para el es algo que le gusta hacer, para tener un ingreso económico par el sustento de su familia y mejorar las condiciones de vida par el y su familia, con los ingresos económicos que el obtiene de sus ventas de dicha actividad que realiza mejora los estudios de sus hijos.

El motivo de la realización del prestamos que el está realizando es para la ampliación de su casa, para exhibir mejor sus productos la las personas turísticas que visitan el lugar donde el está ubicado en su comunidad. Uno de los sueños de don Francisco es la ampliación de su negocio y la realización de más productos artesanales para poder brindarles un buen servicio a las personas que lo visitan.
texts.en:
The streets of Sololá are witness to the attractive colors that cover its handmade fabrics. It is impossible for tourists to pass by these fabrics without stopping to admire and purchase some. Francisco is an example of the living cultures of our country, Guatemala. 

He is 43 years old and married, with three children ages 14, 10, and 7. His children all study in a school near his community. The dignified work that Francisco carries out each day is producing traditional handmade fabrics. He has been making and selling these for over 12 years since it is something that he enjoys doing that also helps to provide an income on which to support his family and improve their quality of life. With the earnings he gets from this activity, he will be able to offer his children a better education. 

Francisco is requesting this loan in order to expand his house so that he can display more of his products to tourists that visit his community. One of Francisco's dreams is to expand his business and make more handmade crafts so that he can offer better service to the people who visit him.

loans.use: to remodel his house.

loans.name: Bophal's Group

texts.en:
Bophal is 29 years old, married, and blessed with two kids. One of her children is in school and the other is too young for school. Bophal works as a farmer and resides in the Bovel District of Battambang Province.

Bophal maintains her family's basic needs through rice and maize farming and another job. Currently, Bophal is in her fifth loan cycle loan with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. Bophal has completely repaid her past loans, which has helped her improve her living conditions. Now, she leads a loan group of two people. Bophal will use her entire loan portion to buy rice seeds and pay for plowing. She hopes to increase her yield.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and pay for plowing

loans.name: José Hilario

texts.es:
José de 69 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado debido a la situación económica no pudo seguir estudiando; esta acompañado  con él no vive ningún hijo, su compañera de vida se dedica los oficios del hogar. 

José tiene 50 años de experiencia en la agricultura, actualmente tiene sembrado 21,000  metros cuadrados de yuca, la distancia que esta su cultivo de su casa es de 4 kilómetros de distancia ese recorrido lo hace en bicicleta, por la mañana trabaja hasta las 12:00 PM por la tarde regresa a sus casa para ayudar a su compañera de vida en el trabajo de la casa.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar  8 sacos de abono y mas fertilizantes para su cultivo, eso le dará mayor seguridad de poder obtener mejor cosecha, de esta manera tendrá mejores ingresos económicos cuando venda su producto.
 

José sueña con tener su casa propia, ya que vive en una casa que no es de él.
texts.en:
José is 69 years old. He studied until first grade because his family's financial circumstances would not allow him to stay in school. José is married and none of his children live with him. His wife stays at home and takes care of the housework.

José has 50 years of experience in farming. He currently sows 21,000 square meters of yuca on land located four kilometers away from his house. José rides a bicycle to and from his fields every day to work in the mornings until noon, when he returns home to help his wife with the work around their house.

The loan that José is requesting from CrediCampo will help him to buy 8 sacks of compost and other fertilizers for his crops. This will give him more security in obtaining a better harvest. This way, he will have a better income when he sells his products.

José dreams of owning his house since he currently lives in one that does not belong to him.

loans.use: to buy 8 sacks of compost and other fertilizers for his crops. This will give him more security in obtaining a better harvest. This way, he will have a better income when he sells his products.

loans.name: Elida De Jesus

texts.es:
La señora  Elida de Jesús tiene 51 años de edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia tiene dos  hijas  que  dependen de ella, vive en una comunidad al Oriente de Honduras y se dedica desde hace 05 años al negocio de abarrotería.
Doña Elida vende todos los días de la semana y está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de arroz, frijoles, harina, maíz, manteca, cal, café, azúcar, frescos, jugos, etc.  Siendo sus clientes amigos y vecinos que transitan por su casa.
Doña Elida con el apoyo del préstamo espera mejorar su negocio y tener la mercadería suficiente para lograr que sus ingresos mejoren y poder seguir apoyando a su familia, su sueño es engrandecer el negocio y poderles brindar educación a sus hijas.


 Trojes, Honduras - Julio del 2014.
texts.en:
Elida de Jesús is 51 years old, living with her spouse in her own home, and has two daughters that depend on her. She lives in a community in Eastern Honduras and has spent 5 years earning a living in the grocery business. 
Elida sells every day of the week and is requesting this loan to but rice, beans, flour, corn, butter, lime, coffee, sugar, drinks, juices etc. Her clients being friends and neighbors that pass by her house. 
Elida, with the support from the loan, hopes to better her business and have sufficient merchandise to achieve an increase in her income and to be able to continue supporting her family. Her dream is to grow the business and be able to give an education to her daughters. 
Trojes, Honduras - July 2014.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, flour, corn, butter, lime, coffee, sugar, drinks, juices, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Sokly's Group

texts.en:
Sokly is 39 years old and a widowed mother of five children, one of whom remains in school. As the family breadwinner, Sokly grows rice on one hectare of land and raises ten pigs in her backyard. Currently, she can earn up to 38,900 KHR per day. 

This is the second loan for Sokly and her co-borrower with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. They successfully repaid their past loan. As the group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy rice seeds and crop fertilizers. She very much hopes that she can produce a better yield than before.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and crop fertilizers

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sary's Group

texts.en:
Sary, a villager from Kampong Cham Province, is forty-nine years old. She is a mother of three kids. Sary earns income from growing rice and working at a construction site.

Sary has serviced another loan with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. She has successfully fully repaid her past loan, which has helped her gradually improve her lifestyle. Now, Sary leads a loan group of four. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seeds, and fertilizers for her crops. She hopes that she can produce a better yield than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, rice seeds, and fertilizers for her crop

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Amilcar Geovany

texts.es:
El señor Amílcar de 35  años de edad, tiene un hijo que depende de él, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo  al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 01 año  a la venta de repuestos de bicicletas como llantas, rines, monturas, bombas, accesorios y bicicletas nuevas.
Don Amílcar  su venta es con los pobladores de esa zona, de lunes a domingo, es un hombre trabajador con deseos de salir adelante.
Don Amílcar  está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de repuestos de bicicleta y bicicletas nuevas como llantas, cadenas, grasas, agarraderas, etc. con el apoyo de este crédito espera mejorar sus ingresos y su negocio y suplir de esta forma su necesidad de financiamiento, está muy contento de trabajar por primera vez con Prisma. 
Su sueño es mejorar su negocio para este fin de año.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Julio del 2014.
texts.en:
35-year-old Amílcar has a son that depends on him, lives in a community in San Lorenzo in southern Honduras, has his own home and has spent 1 year earning a living selling bicycle spare parts like tires, wheels, frames, pumps, accessories and new bicycles.
Amílcar sells to the inhabitants in his area, Monday through Sunday. He is a hard-working man with desires to come out ahead.
Amílcar is requesting this loan to buy new bicycles and spare parts like tires, chains, lubricants, handles etc. With the support of this loan he hopes to increase his income and his business- and this way replace his need for financing. He is very happy to be working with Prisma for the first time. 
His dream is to improve his business by the end of this year. 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - July 2014.

loans.use: to buy tires, chains, lubricant, handels, etc for his business.

loans.name: Benjamin Arnoldo

texts.es:
El señor Benjamín de 32 años de edad, vive con su esposa en casa de ella, se dedica desde hace 5 años a la venta de zapatos y ropa nueva, el vende productos como ser: camisas de hombre y de mujer, pantalones, bóxer, chores y también ropa de niños.
Don Benjamín  vive en una aldea en el municipio de Pespire al sur de Honduras, es un hombre emprendedor con deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida.
Don Benjamín  está solicitando el préstamo para surtir su negocio de materia prima como; zapatos, sandalias, botas de hule, toallas, blusas, camisas, pantalones, etc. con este préstamo el pretende mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Don Benjamín  su sueño es  crecer con su negocio para mejorar su calidad de vida. 

San Lorenzo valle, Honduras  - Agosto de 2014
texts.en:
Señor Benjamin, who is 32 years old, lives with his wife in her house. For 5 years he has been selling shoes and new clothing. He sells products such as shirts for men and women, pants, boxer shorts, shorts, and also children's clothing.

Don Benjamin lives in a village in the township of Pespire in the south of Honduras. He is an entrepreneurial man with the desire to improve his quality of life. He is applying for the loan to stock his business with staples such as shoes, sandals, rubber boots, towels, blouses, shirts, pants, etc. With this loan he intends to improve his income and his quality of life.

Don Benjamin's dream is to grow with his business to improve his quality of life.

San Lorenzo valle, Honduras  - August 2014

loans.use: to buy shoes, sandals, rubber boots, towels, blouses, shirts, pants, etc., for his business

loans.name: Sreytouch

texts.en:
A villager from a rural area located in the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province, Sreytouch is 35 years old and married. She has two dependent children. The primary source of her family’s income is cassava planting. To better support the family, her husband sometimes works for others for a fee. Having been in this business for 15 years, she can earn about 61,000 KHR per day and manage to save about 26,000 KHR each day after expenses.

Sreytouch has been a member of VisionFund for one cycle already and she wisely and successfully used the first loan to improve her family’s livelihood and relieve their financial burden. Now applying for another loan, she is going to use this loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend for labor. She hopes to make healthier rice and cassava so as to increase her family’s income to better their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov lives in a rural village of the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She is 27 years old and married with two children. To support her family, she has been working as a rice farmer for more than almost seven years. The current business earns her about $23 US per day to make a living and she can afford to save $15 US per day.

Pov has been with VisionFund for two cycles and now she is applying for a loan to buy a plot of farmland. She hopes to extend her farmland so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland

loans.name: Siti Mukadamah

texts.en:
Siti Mukadamah, 47 years old and married, lives with her husband and their children. She is a housewife who has a business that distributes clothing from fabric to consumers

She has asked for a loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah for 8,000,000 rupiah.  This loan will be used for the improvement of access to water and sanitation for their family. She will build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home. The sanitation provides her and her family with better health. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: to build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home

loans.name: Ombiah

texts.en: Ombiah is 37 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and their daughter. She has a business selling food at school. She has asked for a loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah for 8,000,000 rupiah.  This loan will be used for the improvement of access to water and sanitation for their family.  She will build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home. The sanitation makes her and her family healthier. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: to build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home

loans.name: Hartati

texts.en:
Hartati is 37 years old and married. She lives with her husband and their daughter. 

She has asked for a loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah for 8,000,000 rupiah. This loan will be used for the improvement of access to water and sanitation for their family. She will build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home. The sanitation make her and her family healthier. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: to build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs and concentrated feeds to give an impulse to her work and continue giving sustenance to her children.

loans.name: Thouran's Group

texts.en: Thouran is 33 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school. To support the family, she and her husband do rice farming, which is the main source of income. The income earned is just enough to provide daily food for the family. Due to a shortage of working capital for farming this year, Thouran decided to request the first loan with VisionFund in order to get the money to buy rice seeds and also to pay the plowing fee for the rice paddy. With this loan, Thouran hopes to increase the profit to better support her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Thenn

texts.en:
Living in a rural area located in Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district, Thenn is a 36-year-old mother of five children. A farmer who has been growing cassava for two years. she can make a daily income of 37,000KHR and is able to save about 20,000KHR per day after expenses for future needs.

This will be Thenn's third loan from Kiva’s partner VisionFund. She is leading her group to request a loan, her portion of which she will use to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. Thenn hopes it will enable her to earn more income.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Horng's Group

texts.en:
Horng, 35, is married and living with her two children in a rural village of the Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She earns a living through growing rice and working for others for a fee. She has been in this business for 15 years, earning about KHR 33,000 per day and is able to save about KHR 20,000 each day after expenses for needs.

Horng has been a member of VisionFund for two cycles already and she completely repaid the past loans, which have helped her relieve her family’s financial burden and support her business. She is now leading her group to seek a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her business to respond to her customers’ needs on time and also hopes to earn a larger income to make her living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Sreymot's Group

texts.en:
Sreymot, 30, lives with her husband and four children in a rural village of the Sithor Kandal district of Prey Veng province, Cambodia. She has struggled to feed and care for her children, farming rice and working for others for a fee. Together, they can earn about 44,000 KHR per day and manage to save about 22,000 KHR each day for the future.

Sreymot is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to make more crops so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Norn's Group

texts.en:
Norn is a 44-year-old mother of six children and earns a living through farming rice and working for others for a fee. She has been in this business for 26 years and the current business earns her about 66,000 KHR per day to feed the family.

Norn is a second-cycled client with VisionFund. She wisely and successfully used her first loan from VisionFund to better support her family’s living and business. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her family’s income from the current business to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies for her coffee plants in the new season.

loans.name: Mary's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in Kampong Cham province’s Ponhea Krek district, Mary is now 57 years old and married. She has five children.

Mary and her husband are farmers who have engaged in growing cassava for 30 years. The current business earns them about 40,000 KHR per day to support the family’s needs, and allows them to save about 20,000 KHR each day. 

Mary is a first-loan-cycle client with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and pesticide for her rice paddy, and also use a portion of it to spend on labor. She hopes the loan from VisionFund will enable her to make more healthy rice to make more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticide for her rice paddy

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Chen's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village in the Ou Reang Ov district, where crop farming is a common way to earn a living, Chen, 57, is married with five children.

She and her husband grow rice as the main business for the family’s income. Having been in the business for 39 years, they can earn about 27,000 KHR per day to respond to the family’s needs, and manage to save about 12,000 KHR each day. 

Chen has been a member of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for one loan cycle already, and she wisely and successfully used the past two loans to improve her family’s livelihood. She is now leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend for labor. She hopes to increase crop yields to earn a larger income so as to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Touch's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district, Touch is now 47 years old and married. Touch and her husband are farmers who grow rice and plant cassava as the main business to support the family and they supplement the family’s income by selling grocery items. Having been in the business for 10 years, they are able to make daily earnings of 10,000 KHR and manage to save about 3,000 KHR each day.

This is the fifth loan for Touch with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticide for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to extend her cassava plantation and also grow her crops healthily to make more income to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide for her farmland

loans.name: Sokunthy's Group

texts.en:
A young married mother of two, Sokunthy lives with her family in Phnom Proek district's Battambang province.

The family has been doing an agricultural business for more than five years. Cassava planting is the primary source of income. Sokunthy is new to VisionFund. With financial constraints on doing the business, she decided to borrow money from VisionFund in order to buy cassava seeds and also to pay for a ploughing fee.

She hopes the crop yield will be higher, allowing her to generate more income for her to set aside some savings for the kids' school fees when they get to school age.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and pay for labor fee

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Pov is 51 years old and married with five children, one of whom is still under her support. Pov and her husband have been planting and selling cassava for more than five years to support the family. 

This is her first loan with VisionFund. Because of a shortage of working capital, Pov requested a loan to buy cassava seeds and also to reserve some money to pay for the labor fee. She hopes this loan will enable her to plant good-quality crops so that she can sell them for more profit.

loans.use: to buy cassava seeds and pay for the labor fee.

loans.name: Neang's Group

texts.en:
A rural villager living in Kampong Cham province’s Ou Reang Ov district, Neang is aged 44 years and married with four children.

She is a rice farmer who has been farming rice for 26 years to make a living. Together, they can earn about 29,000 KHR per day from the current business, and manage to save 17,000 KHR daily for their future needs. 

This is the first loan for Neang with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to earn more crops from her farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Malin's Group

texts.en:
Malin is aged 29 years and is a young mother of two children.

She and her husband make a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for 11 years. The current business earns them about 29,000 KHR per day, and they are able to save about 14,000 KHR daily for their future needs.

This is the second loan for Malin with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is now leading her group to seek a loan to buy fertilizers and pesticide for her farmland, and to use a portion of it to spend for labor. She hopes to make more crops and sell them for a good price to make her family’s living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticide for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Normal Group

texts.fr:
Alexandre  fait partie du groupe  Normal et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il  a 38 ans et est marié à Angélique, une e femme de ménage. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants âgés de 1 à 15 ans dont 4 étudient.
 
Il fait le commerce de matériel de cuisine (casserole, thermos, assiettes,…)  depuis  11 ans. 

Il  est à son  deuxième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité d’ustensiles de cuisine (casseroles, assiettes, thermos,…), à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  construire une maison sur sa parcelle.
texts.en:
Alexandre is a member of the Normal group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 38 years old and is married to Angelique who is a house cleaner. Together, they have five children between the ages of 1 and 15. Four of their children go to school. 

He has been selling kitchen appliances (pans, thermoses, plates, etc.) for 11 years.

This is his second loan with Turame. With his Kiva loan, he would like to increase his capital and buy a large amount of kitchen appliances (pans, thermoses, plates, etc.) that he can resell in order to earn more money. 

In the next few years, he would like to build a home on his parcel of land.

loans.use: increase his capital and buy a large amount of kitchen appliances so that he can earn more money.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to provide aid to her yuca, bean and corn crops

loans.name: Wilman

texts.es: Wilman, tiene 35 años de edad, está casado, tiene 1 hijo, vive con su esposa e hijos en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz y frijoles y la siembra de café, esta actividad siempre la ha realizado y  hace 12 años tiene sus propios cultivos que le generan ingresos para el sostén familiar. La producción que sale la vende en la misma zona. El préstamo que solicita es de 12,000 lempiras para la compra de fertilizantes y  foliares para el mantenimiento de los cultivos. Su propósito es brindar mejor asistencia a sus cultivos, sembrar más en su finca y obtener mejores ingresos económicos para ayudar a la familia.
texts.en:
Wilman is 35 years old, and he is married with one child. He lives with his wife and children in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira.  

He devotes himself to the cultivation of basic grains such as corn and beans, and to coffee growing.  He has always done this work, and for 12 years he has had his own crops. They generate income for him so that he can provide for his family.  He grows and sells the produce within the same zone.

He is requesting a loan of 12,000 lempiras for the purchase of fertilizer and foliar feed for crop maintenance.  His plan is to give his crops better care, plant more on his farm, and obtain better income in order to help his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and foliar feed for crop maintenance.

loans.name: Sokkhoeurn

texts.en:
A villager from a rural district of Kampong Cham province, Sokkhoeurn supports her family by growing rubber, which is the family's main source of income. Adding to this, Sokkhoeun and her husband also do rice farming and cassava planting to make more income. 

As the price of rubber dropped, they are now short of working capital to do the business. After the first loan ended, Sokkhoeurn applied for another loan from VisionFund for the survival of the agricultural business, as she will spend the money on fertilizers and the labor fee.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for the labor fee.

loans.name: Roem

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Roem is a 44-year-old mother of five children. She is a farmer in the local area who grows pineapples. Having been in business for 11 years, she can earn a daily income of approximately KHR11,000, and is able to save about KHR6,000 each day for future needs. 

This will be Roem's fourth loan with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. She wisely and successfully used her first loan to improve her family’s livelihood and relieve financial burdens. She will use this loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland, purchases that will enable her to grow her produce healthily and fruitfully. Roem hopes to earn more income to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Jose Fernando

texts.es:
José es un hombre joven el cual se desempeña en diferentes areas de la agricultura y la crianza de animales en diferentes fincas del municipio de Puerto Salgar. 

En vista de que los ingresos no son suficientes para cubrir los gastos de su hogar puesto que este es un trabajo muy mal remunerado, comenzó con una actividad que realiza en los ratos libres que le quedan de su trabajo y es la cría y levante de cerdos de engorde con los que ha podido mejorar las condición es de vida de su familia. 

Como persona responsable está a cargo de varios gastos en su hogar por lo que no le queda mucho capital para invertir en su negocio. 

Es por esta razón que requiere un crédito para la compra de Cerdos de engorde y compra de concentrados para la alimentación de los mismos.

Con este préstamo podrá mejorar sus ventas y su producción teniendo más activos en su micro negocio y haciendo más atractivo a la vista de los clientes pues tendrá más cerdos que ofertar.

Su principal sueño es poder generar buenos ingresos para no ver pasar a su familia ninguna necesidad pues es algo que vivió y que lo afecto de gran manera por esta razón trabaja incansablemente por ellos.

Apoya con un crédito a un campesino humilde y trabajador!
texts.en:
José is a young man that works in different areas of agriculture and in raising animals on different farms in the city of Puerto Salgar. Because this is a low-paying job, his incomes are not sufficient to cover his home expenses. So he started a new activity that he performs in the free time that he has at his job, which is raising pigs. By doing this, he has been able to improve his family's living conditions.

As a responsible person, he is in charge of various expenses in his home, which does not leave him much capital to invest in his business. For this reason he needs a loan to buy pigs and to buy concentrated food to feed them. With this loan he will be able to improve his sales and production by having more activities in his small business and making it more visually attractive to customers, plus he will have more pigs to offer.

Please support a humble and hard-working farmer with this loan.

loans.use: to buy pigs and to buy concentrated food to feed them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy recently born calves.

loans.name: Sout's Group

texts.en:
Sout, 36, is married with four children residing in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. To support the family, she and her husband have been farming rice for 15 years. Together, they can earn about 40,000 Cambodia riels (KHR) per day and can save about 16,000 KHR each day for their future needs. 

Sout is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan. She is going to use her portion to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farmland.

loans.name: Eduin Leon

texts.es:
Eduin vive con su pareja y tienen 2 hijos de 8 y 11 años, vive felizmente junto con su familia en zona rural del municipio de Medellín.

En la actualidad ya cumplió 2 años de estar trabajando con la cría de cerdos de engorde, actividad con la que ha intentado sobrevivir y sacar adelante a su familia para que nunca les falte nada. 

Ha tenido dificultades económicas que han afectado su negocio y que lo han obligado a detener sus actividades en ciertas ocasiones. 

Sueña con mejorar el lugar para la cría de sus animales y también con tener una planta de engorde de pollos, por esto pasa la solicitud de un préstamo, el cual invertirá en la compra cerdos de engorde los cuales tienen muy buena aceptación por la buena crianza y mantenimiento de los mismos. 

Su calidad de vida  y la de su familia se incrementará en la medida que aumentan las ventas de sus animales y alcance las metas establecidas para  un futuro no lejano.

Con el apoyo de este préstamo Eduin podrá continuar trabajando y podrá darle a su familia todo lo mejor.
texts.en:
Eduin lives with his partner and they have 2 children aged 8 and 11 years. He lives happily with his family in a rural area of the municipality of Medellín.

He has currently already completed 2 years working raising and fattening pigs, an activity with which he has tried to survive and bring up his family so they never lack anything.

He has had financial difficulties that have affected his business and that has forced him to stop his activities at times.

He dreams of improving the place where he breeds his animals and also of having a structure for fattening his chickens, which is why he is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of pigs to fatten which are well received because they are well-bred and maintained.

His quality of life and that of his family will increase measured by the increase in animal sales and established goals for the not too distant future. With the help of this loan Eduin can continue working and will give his family all the best.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten and food to care for them and to improve his business and raise his family

loans.name: Willy

texts.es:
Willy con 19 años de edad es un joven muy emprendedor y trabajador. 

Toda su vida fue criado en el campo, donde ha realizado actividades agropecuarias la mayor parte de su vida.  

Actualmente trabaja como jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región, pero desea iniciar con un cultivo de papa que le permita mejorar los ingresos que obtiene para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar y adicionalmente para pagar sus estudios.

Willy es un joven serio, responsable, comprometido con su familia y su trabajo, por ello siempre quiere seguir avanzando es busca de un futuro mejor, por esta razón solicita su primer ciclo de crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas de papa y abonos con el fin de iniciar con su proyecto productivo y poder sacar una cosecha en óptimas condiciones. 

Todo esto le ayudará a seguir adelante, mejorando poco a poco su nivel de vida y la de familia.

Apoya a Willy, un joven emprendedor y enérgico del campo Colombiano con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Willy at 19 years old is a very entrepreneurial and hard-working youth. He was raised in the countryside and has done agricultural work most of his life. Currently he works as day labor on different farms in his area but he wants to start growing potatoes which would allow him to increase his income. Then he can help his parents with the household expenses and also pay for his studies. Willy is serious, responsible and committed to his family and his work. So he always wants to continue to progress, searching for a better future.

For this reason he is requesting his first loan to invest in the purchase of agricultural inputs like potato seeds and manure with the goal of starting his commercial project and be able to produce a harvest in excellent condition. All this will help him go forward, improving little by little his standard of living and that of his family. Support Willy, a young and energetic entrepreneur from the fields of Colombia with a loan.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and manure to start his crops.

loans.name: Kimeng's Group

texts.en:
A local resident from Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Kimeng is 50 years old and a mother blessed with seven children. She meets the needs in her big household via rice farming and a paid job supported by her husband. This is the business that she has had for ages. 

With this loan, she is a seventh-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s field partner). She has repaid back her past loans completely and they have returned her a decent income to support her lifestyle. Now, she leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay a plowing fee. She hopes to gain a better yield than before so that she can make more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay a plowing fee.

loans.name: Kara's Group

texts.en: A 27-year-old married lady residing in Battambang province, Kara is one of the breadwinners who strive to make a living via raising ducks. This is the business that she has had for five years. This loan is her second loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s field partner). She has repaid her past loan completely and it enables her to uplift her living conditions gradually. Now, she is teaming up with a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion on buying more ducklings to raise. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: to buy more ducklings to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy crates and guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
Gracias al micro-crédito hoy la señora Dora  puede tener una cafetera muy hermosa y tradicional en Guatape, donde es una zona muy turística y ofrece sus servicios básicamente a turista.  Por tal razón está muy agradecida pues gracias a este apoyo de prestamista puede tener un estilo de vida sostenible y lo más importante puede mantener a su familia conformada pos sus dos hijos de 12 y 19 años de edad que depende de ella, uno de ellos le ayuda con la tienda. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de una maquina granizadora para completar sus servicios de cafetería y hacerlo más atractivo para el público pues algo que disfrutan mucho es un rico Granizado en una tarde soleada las cuales son muy constantes pues Guatape está cerca a Medellín y gozan de climas similares los cuales se han hecho conocer la ciudad de la eterna primavera. 

Con el crédito podrá seguir con su empresa junto con sus hijos podrán acceder a una buena educación y seguir con el proyecto de una vivienda propia y un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Thanks to microcredit today Dora has a very beautiful and traditional cafe in Guatape which is a popular tourist area. She offers her services primarily to tourists. For this reason, she is very grateful for the support from lenders so that she can have a sustainable lifestyle and, most importantly, she can care for her family. She has two children aged 12 and 19 that depend on her. One of them helps in the store. 

She requests a loan to buy a slush beverage machine for her cafe, making it more appealing to the public because they enjoy delicious slushies on sunny afternoons which are very commonplace because Guatape is close to Medellin. They have similar climates and Medellin is known as the City of Eternal Spring. 

With the loan she can continue with her business. Her children will have access to a good education and they will continue to improve their home for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase a slush beverage machine

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
34 años y un espíritu muy luchador son dos virtudes que caracterizan a la señora Claudia quien logro montar con ayuda de préstamos un almacén donde vende productos como pintura y herramienta de fuerza como martillos, alicates, llaves. 

Madre de 2 hijos de 7 y 4 años de edad los cuales están iniciando su etapa estudiantil pero ella los mira y los educa con miras al futuro que logren graduarse y más importante que aprovechen un estudio y consigan un buen empleo. 

Quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de pinturas y más herramienta de mano como lo son (hombresolo, picas, palas, entro otros.) 

Con el crédito mejora la variedad de su almacén, tendrá más herramienta y equipos disponible para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Thirty-four years of age and a fighting spirit are two of the virtues that characterize Claudia, who with the help of loans was able to open a store where she sells products like paint and tools like hammers, pliers and keys. 

She is the mother of two children ages 7 and 4 who are starting school, but she looks at them and educates them to look to the future so they will manage to graduate and more importantly take advantage of their studies and get a good job 

She wants to ask for a loan to buy paints and more hand tools like locking pliers, spades and shovels, among others.

With the loan she will improve the variety in her store and will have more tools and equipment available for her customers.

loans.use: to buy paints and tools like locking pliers, spades and shovels, among others.

loans.name: Luis Gonzalo

texts.es: Luis de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Luis está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para continuar con sus siembras y si poder tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Luis is 33 years old and lives in a house he owns with his life partner and their children. He makes a living in agriculture by growing corn. He sells his products in the various markets near his place of residence. With what he obtains from his sales, he is able to cover some of his household expenses. Luis is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, insect control products, etc. to continue with his planting and to be able to have  a better quality of life along with his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, insect control products, etc.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor de 45 años de edad  se dedica a realizar viajes en su pick up por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa, tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la amabilidad y la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, Victor vive en casa alquilada con su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él está solicitando un crédito  para darle mantenimiento a su vehículo y comprar llantas nuevas, y así poder seguir con su trabajo y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Victor is 45 years old. He works making trips in his pick-up throughout the suburbs that are close to his home. He has many customers who prefer him because of his kindness and the responsibility he demonstrates while driving. Victor lives in a rented house with his life companion and his children. He is asking for a loan to service his vehicle and to buy new tires so he can continue his work and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to service his vehicle and to buy new tires

loans.name: Victoriano Jose

texts.es:
El señor Victoriano desde muy joven se dedico a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y crianza de animales, actividades que le enseño su padre para su supervivencia y que hoy en día ejerce con orgullo.

Hoy en día su actividad principal es la cría de cerdos de engorde, actividad con la que intenta sobrevivir y sacar adelante a sus hijos.

Tiene la esperanza de obtener un préstamo para la compra de cerdos de engorde y concentrados para su alimentación.

De esta forma podrá aumentar su producción y mejorar sus ingresos.

Es padre responsable y amoroso con sus hijos, vive en una finca con ellos y su esposa.

Sueña con poder otorgarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad para que más adelante se puedan defender solos y sean independientes.

Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien.
texts.en:
From a young age, Victoriano dedicated himself to farm work: ranging from agriculture to raising animals. His father taught him these activities for his survival and now he exercises them with a lot of pride. 

At this moment in time, his principal activity is raising fattening pigs; with this activity he intends to survive and support his children.He hopes to obtain a loan to buy fattening pigs and concentrates for their feed. 

In this way, he can increase his production and improve his income. He is a responsible and loving father to his children, and lives on farm with them and his wife. 

He dreams with being able to give his children a quality education so they can later on fend for themselves and be independent. 

He goes to his business every day and strives to do everything well.

loans.use: buy fattening pigs and concentrates to grow his business and support his family.

loans.name: Chanla's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from the Moung Russey district, Chanla is 31 years old and married. She is a mother of three kids, two schoolchildren and one under-school aged kid. 

She has managed two hectares of rice crops as the main source of income and works for others for a fee for extra income. She has been involved in her current business for 11 years, earning about 31,000 KHR per day. 

Chanla, the former borrower who has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for the past two loans and has fully repaid them, leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy potash, rice seed, and to pay for a plowing fee. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy potash, rice seed, and to pay for a plowing fee

loans.name: Savin's Group

texts.en:
Savin, aged 59 and a villager from the Bovel district of Battambang province, is a farmer who grows rice as the main source of income and works for others for a fee as extra work to make more income. 

She has been involved in her current business for 15 years, and it has returned her about 40,000 KHR per day. This is the fourth loan for Savin with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has paid back her past loan with success, and now her living condition is getting better than before. Now, in a group of three, she is a leader. 

She will spend her entire loan portion to pay for a plowing fee and to buy rice seed for replanting her crops. She highly hopes that she can make more income so that she can keep improving her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy rice seed for replanting her crops

loans.name: Kimheng's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Bovel district of Battambang province, Kimheng is 51 years old and a mother of two children. Currently, one of her children is in school. 

She earns a living via cassava, maize, and soybean farming. She supplements her income via rice farming. She has been involved in her current business for nine years. This is her fourth loan for Kimheng with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and all have been successfully repaid. Now, she leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing fees, to buy rice seed, and to pay for transplanting fees. She highly hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees, to buy rice seed, and to pay for transplanting fees

loans.name: Champey's Group

texts.en:
Champey is 25 years old and she is a local resident from the Bovel district of Battambang province. She has two children who are too young for school. 

To overcome the need in her household, she grows cassava, maize, soybean, and rice as her main source of income and works for others for a fee.  

This is the third loan for Champey and second loan for her co-borrower. She has repaid back her past loan completely and it has gradually improved her lifestyle. Now, in a group of two, she is a leader. Champey will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing fees, to buy rice seed, and to pay for transplanting fees. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees, to buy rice seed, and to pay for transplanting fees

loans.name: Cesar Julio

texts.es:
Cesar es un joven emprendedor, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Imperial junto a su familia. 
Sus padres son su mayor motivación en la vida, es por ellos que lucha día a día para poder apoyarlos en todo y poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.
Desde hace algún tiempo trabaja como mototaxista con un vehículo que alquila, le va muy bien porque es muy trabajador, responsable y sobre todo porque siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de sus clientes y respeta las señales de tránsito.
Cesar desea comprarse una mototaxi para que pueda obtener mayores ingresos porque será de su propiedad. Gracias a los prestamistas Kiva él podrá hacer realidad ese sueño, ya que con su ayuda Cesar va a adquirir una mototaxi para que pueda tener más ganancias y así ya no tener que alquilar. De esta manera seguirá esforzándose para poder sacar a su familia adelante y brindarles un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Cesar is a young 21 year old entrepreneur who lives in Imperial together with his family. His parents are his main motivation in his life. It is for them that he struggles day by day to be able to support them in everything and to be able to provide them with a better quality of living. For some time now he has been working as a motorcycle taxi driver with a vehicle that he rents. It suits him well as he is very hard-working, responsible and moreover very concerned about the well-being of his clients. And he obeys the traffic rules.

Cesar wants to buy a motorcycle taxi so that he can get more profit as it would be his property. Thanks to the lenders at Kiva he can make this dream a reality as with their help Cesar is going to acquire his motorcycle taxi so that he can make more and not have to pay rent. In this way he can continue to make the effort to get ahead with his family and provide them with a better future.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle taxi to work.

loans.name: Tem's Group

texts.en:
A villager from the Battambang province’s Thmor Koul district, Tem is 45 years old and married. She has seven children. The main source of her family’s income is from her corn plantation. Having been in this business for 10 years, she is able to earn a daily income of KHR 40,000 to support her family and she can save about KHR 15,000 per day for the future needs. 

This is the first loan for Tem with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to seek for a loan to buy corn seeds for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend on plowing the field. She hopes to make more crops from her plantation.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Sol's Group

texts.en:
Sol, 34, is married with four children, residing in a rural village located in the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Cambodia. For the last ten years, she has been farming rice as primary source of family’s income. The current business earns her about 50,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Sol is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to seek for a loan. Sol, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Chea's Group

texts.en:
Chea is aged 52 years and married. She lives with her husband and six children in a rural area located in the Sangke district, Cambodia. She has been selling grocery items for 11 years. The current business earns her family about 100,000 KHR per day to feed the family but she manages to save about 20,000 KHR each day.

This is the first loan for Chea with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy more grocery items to resale. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to resell

loans.name: Pen's Group

texts.en:
Pen is aged 51 years and married with four children. She lives in a rural village of the Battambang province’s Thmor Koul district, earning a living through farming rice and supplementing the income by selling Khmer noodles to help earn income to support the family. Together, she and her husband can earn about KHR 90,000 per day from the current business and can save about KHR 20,000 each day for the future needs.

This is third loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Pen, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend for labor. She hopes to grow more rice and sell it for a good price to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Choert's Group

texts.en:
A villager from a rural area located in the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Choert is 49 years old and married with four children. She has earned a living through raising fish for five years. Together, they can earn about KHR 55,000 per day from the current business and can save about KHR 15,000 each day for the future needs. 

This is the fifth loan for Choert’s group of two members and they both successfully repaid the loans with VisionFund. The loans from VisionFund has helped Choert better support her family. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, she wants to use her portion to buy more fish to raise. She hopes to fatten her fish so as to sell them for a good price.

loans.use: to buy more fish to raise

loans.name: Chrealy's Group

texts.en:
Chrealy, 44, lives in a rural village of the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district. She is a married mother of six children. Her family’s income is from leasing rice paddy. She has been in this business for 30 years to make a living. From the current business, she can earn about KHR 36,000 per day and manage to save about KHR 36,000 per day for the future needs.
 
Chrealy has been a member of VisionFund for six cycles already and she completely repaid the loans. She has successfully used the loans from VisionFund to better support her living. Now she is leading her group to ask for another loan. She is going to use her portion to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to extend her farmland to increase her business so as to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Lea's Group

texts.en:
Lea, a resident or Srey Snom district of Siem Reap province, is 51 years old and married. She is a mother of eight children. She overcomes her family’s hardship via rice cropping on two hectares of farmland. This business earns her about 32,300 KHR per day.  

Lea has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for her past five loans with a successful repayment. Now, in a group of six, she is a leader. Lea will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing fee, rice seed, and labor costs. She hopes that she can gain a good yield than before.

loans.use: To pay for plowing fee, rice seed, and labor costs.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 21 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, ella posee desde hace varios años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su casa de habitación, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como: sopas, detergentes, arroz, golosinas, refrescos, etc. y así tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The client, 21 years old, lives with her family in their own home. For several years she has had a small store located in her house of residence. She has a lot of customers due to the variety of products that she sells and the good prices. With what she obtains from her sales she is able to settle some expenses that come up in her home. The client is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise such as: soup, detergent, rice, sweets, beverages, etc. and in that way have, together with her family, a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soup, detergent, rice, sweets, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Diego Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro a sus 18 años de edad cuenta con 4 años de experiencia en el mundo de los tatuajes y es que desde muy joven se ha apasionado por este arte corporal. 
Tiene un negocio formalmente montado y sabe que para seguir adelante debe mejorar el aspecto y tener herramientas suficientes para un buen servicio como pistolas, tintas, catálogos, e imágenes en su local. 
Quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de pistola para tatuar, de tintas de colores, realizar adecuaciones al local como cuadros con sus tatuajes más representativos, pintar el local. 

El crédito será de gran importancia pues apenas se está dando a conocer al mercado, es tan solo un joven de 18 años que solo quiere progresar, ganar su vida humilde y honradamente, tener capital para estudiar y ayudar a sus padres que tanto tiempo lo criaron y lo educaron.
texts.en:
Alejandro, at 18 years of age, has 4 years’ experience in the tattoo world, as he has been passionate about this body art since he was very young. 

He has a formal business, and he knows that in order to move forward he must improve its appearance and have enough tools for a good service, such as tattoo guns, inks, catalogs, and pictures in his shop.

He wants to request a loan in order to purchase a tattoo gun, colored inks, and pictures of his most representative tattoos; and to make changes to the shop, such as painting it, The loan will be of great importance, as he is just becoming known in the marketplace. 

He is just an 18-year-old young man who only wants to make progress and earn his living simply and honorably.  And, he wants to have the capital in order to study and help his parents, who have spent so much time raising and educating him.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for giving tattoos, such as tattoo guns, inks, and pictures of his best tattoos; and to paint the shop and make it more appealing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motor saw to be able to continue his work.

loans.name: Sophan's Group

texts.en:
Sophan, 49, is a local farmer from the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She deals with her daily cost of living via rice farming and her paid-working job. 

She has been involved in the current business for several years and it earns her about 42,000 KHR per day. This is not the first loan for Sophan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely. Now she teams up a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay the plowing fee. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay the plowing fee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, and bologna, among other ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic inputs for cacao crops.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, él posee una panadería en el cual elabora pan francés y pan dulce, posee mucha clientela por su amabilidad a la hora de vender y los precios muy accesibles. Oscar es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre esta en busca de darle lo mejor a su familia, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, latas, levaduras, manteca, etc. y todo lo necesario para su panadería para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos, el tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá tener  una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Oscar, 43 years old, lives in his own home with his wife. He has a bakery in which he makes French bread and sweet bread. He has a lot of customers due to his friendliness at the time of sale and the very accessible prices. Oscar is a very hardworking man who is always in search of giving the best to his family. That is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy wholesale flour, baking sheets, yeast, butter, etc. and everything necessary for his bakery to be able to continue with his work, since that is his only source of income. He has hope that in this way he will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale flour, baking sheets, butter, etc.

loans.name: Nazirjon

texts.ru:
Назирчон жизнерадостный парень в возрасте 24 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребёнка. Он очень трудолюбивый парень. Назирчон со своей женой живут душа в душу, и мечтают воспитывать своих детей хорошими людьми. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Назирчон занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже на протяжении двух лет он занимается купля продажей сухофруктов. Это очень полезные продукты.  Раньше он занимался деканством и потом решил реализовывать свой урожай.

Он привозит на собственной машине сухофрукты, которые закупает в колхозах в город на рынок для продажи. А также покупает на рынке другого вида овощи и фрукты и продаёт их в своём селе. Этот бизнес приносит ему постоянный хороший доход. И сейчас Назирчон хочет расширить свой бизнес, обустроить возле своего дома небольшой прилавок, где его жена будет продавать разнообразные овощи и фрукты. Поэтому он хочет взять кредит для закупа большого ассортимента сухофруктов. Для получения кредита он обратился в Арванд и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Nazirjon is a cheerful, hardworking 24-year-old who is married and has one child.  He and his wife are quite happy together, and hope to raise their children to be good people.  To support his family, Namirjon sells nutritious dried fruits, and has done so for two years already; he used to work on a farm, and decided one day that he'd like to try selling his own produce.  These days, he drives out to local farms and stocks up on dried fruit, then sells it at a marketplace in a nearby city.  He also stocks up on other kinds of produce in the city and sells them in his home village.  

Nazirjon's business provides a decent and reliable income, and he'd like to expand by opening a stall near his house for his wife to sell produce from.  He is seeking a loan from Arvand to stock it with a variety of dried fruits, and is hoping for a positive outcome.

loans.use: stock his new market stall with dried fruit

loans.name: Balcon Florido Group

texts.es: El grupo “BALCON FLORIDO”  es uno de los grupos más antiguos. El cual está integrada por socios dedicados a la agricultura y ganadería y comercio minorista. Idelfonza tiene 59 años de edad es casada con 05 hijos independientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de queso a pedido de sus clientes que ya logro fidelizar  y al publico  de manera ambulatoria. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más quesos. Su mayor deseo es implementar una pequeña bodega en su vivienda. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Idelfonza es la primera del lado izquierdo viste chaleco  de color morado.
texts.en:
The lending group “BALCON FLORIDO” is one of the longest-standing groups. It is made up of members who work in agriculture and cattle and as merchants. Idelfonza, 59, is married and has 5 grown children. She sells cheese on order to a loyal customer base as well as door to door to the general public. She will use the loan to buy more cheeses. Her greatest wish is to have a small store in her home.

The group is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the loans. Idelfonza is the first women on the left in a purple jacket.

loans.use: to buy more cheese.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
La juventud es una gran ventaja para muchos de los emprendedores que quieren aprovechar estos años de vida para salir adelante y tener una empresa rentable para el futuro, uno de ellos es Julián un joven de 18 años de edad que trabaja como operario en un campo de flores pero independientemente quiere comenzar con sus propios cultivos de hortensia. 

Solicita un crédito para la comprar esquejes (plantas fragmentadas para reproducir), comprar abonos y riegos. 
Su principal ventaja es que donde trabaja hay una comercializadora que le comprara su producto, por tal motivo su sueño es ver convertido en realidad este crédito y empezar a trabajar en su producto lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Youth is a great benefit for many entrepreneurs that want to take advantage of this time in their lives to succeed and have a profitable business in the future. One of those young men is Julian, he is an 18 year-old that works as a laborer at a flower field but wants to independently start growing his own hydrangea crop.  

He is requesting a loan to buy bulbs, fertilizer and irrigation. 

His principal advantage is that where he works there is a retailer where he will buy his product from; because of this, his dream is to see this loan become a reality and start working on his product as soon as possible.

loans.use: Comprar  esquejes (plantas fragmentadas para reproducir), comprar abonos y riegos necesarios para iniciar su empresa.

loans.name: Marledis Ester

texts.es:
Marlenis una mujer de 45 años de edad criada bajo el seno de una familia humilde del campo, donde priman valores como el trabajo, la tolerancia y muy por encima de todos la solidaridad y la honradez. 

Es madre de 23 hijos de 22, 20 y 11 años de edad los cuales junto con su marido los ha mantenido con la ayuda de un negocio de venta y comercialización de pollos, los cuales usa para vender y comercializar huevos.

Debido al invierno y las sequias ha perdido varios animales y necesita poblar sus criaderos de pollos por lo que solicita un crédito para la compra de 300 pollos, 21 bultos de engorde y adecuar sus criaderos para no pasar por la misma situación de ver sus animales perecer por las condiciones climáticas. 

Sueña con tener una granja de gallinas, alimentar y perseguirlas, tener un estilo de vida más estable y más digno.
texts.en: Marlenis, 45, was raised by a humble family in a rural area where they prioritize values like work, tolerance, and above all solidarity and honesty. She is a mother of 3 children ages 22, 20 and 11, whom she and her spouse have cared for thanks to their poultry business, through which they sell chickens and eggs. Due to the loss of animals from the winter and the droughts, they need to repopulate their chicken coops, which is why she asks for a loan to buy 300 chickens and 21 packets of fattening feed, and to make repairs to the coops so that they don't lose more animals in bad weather in the future. She dreams of having a hen farm, feeding and chasing them, and of having a more stable and dignified quality of life.

loans.use: to buy 300 chickens, 21 packets of fattening feed, and to improve her coops.

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.es:
Eugenio es un hombre trabajador, tiene 50 años de edad, es casado y vive en Rupa Rupa junto a su familia.
Es una persona que desde muy joven a trabajado en el campo para sacar adelante a su familia y poder brindarles un futuro mejor. Desde hace más de 5 años se dedica a la agricultura, trabaja en los distintas chacras de sus vecinos y le va muy bien porque realiza un excelente trabajo.
Su mayor sueño en la vida es construir su propia casa ya que tiene un terreno y por el momento toda su familia vive en cuarto alquilado.
Eugenio está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comenzar a construir su vivienda para así poder realizar el sueño de toda su familia y puedan vivir cómodamente en un ambiente que les pertenezca y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
