Eugenio is a hardworking man. He is 50 years old, married, and lives in Rupa Rupa together with his family. He is a person who since very young has worked in the field to get his family ahead and to be able to provide them a better future. 

For over five years he has worked in agriculture. He works in the different farms of his neighbors and it goes very well for him because he carries out excellent work. His greatest dream in life is to build his own house now that he has a plot of land and at the moment his entire family lives in a rented room. 

Eugenio is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they have provided him he will be able to begin building his home so that he can achieve the dream of his whole family and they can live comfortably in an environment that belongs to them and in that way improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to build his home.

loans.name: Martha Del Carmen

texts.es:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado un Cantón muy hermoso, su clima es cálido húmedo su gente es muy amable y trabajadora este Cantón es el punto de llegada de muchos turistas ya que a los alrededores del mismo tenemos muchas hosterías en las que se puede descansar y ser tratados con mucha amabilidad
En este Cantón vive y tiene su negocio la señora Martha una mujer luchadora de 32 años ella mantiene una sólida relación como casada de la cual tienen 3 hijos todos están estudiando de la escuela y colegio del Cantón, el esposo trabaja como maestro albañil, ella se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas como tripitas asadas, a este negocio le dedica un promedio de 10 horas por día, aprendió del mismo cuando trabajo como ayudante en un local de venta de estas comidas y luego decidió poner su propio negocio
Solicita el crédito para invertir en el negocio para arreglos y ampliación del mismo, con esta nueva inversión esperan mejorar sus ingresos ya que podrán atraer y atender a más clientes, la señora Martha agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado is a beautiful canton, with a humid climate and hard-working, friendly people. A lot of tourists visit this canton as there are many hotels in the surrounding areas where they can rest and receive a friendly welcome. Martha, a determined 32-year old woman, lives and has her business in this canton. She is happily married and has three children who all go to school in the canton. Her husband is a master mason, and she earns a living by selling fast food such as roasted tripe. She works an average of 10 hours per day. She learned the business while working as an assistant in a shop that sold such foods and later decided to start her own business. 

Martha is requesting this loan to invest in her business, to carry out repairs and to expand. She hopes that this new investment will improve her income as she will be able to attract and serve more customers. Martha is grateful to the Fundación Alternative [Alternative Foundation] and to Kiva for the support and the opportunity they are giving her.

loans.use: to carry out repairs and expand her business.

loans.name: Esmeralda De Jesus

texts.es: Esmeralda de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su esposo, ella posee una tienda desde 15 años, es una persona amable, responsable, luchadora y con ganas de sacar a su familia adelante, hace unos meses solicito a INTEGRAL un crédito para poder comprar más productos para la tienda, y así pudo surtir con más cosas, la demanda de los clientes aumento, y con las ventas ha ido solventando los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Esmeralda nuevamente está solicitando otro crédito para poder comprar granos básicos, golosinas, dulces, azúcar, sopas, detergentes, jabon, etc. todo por mayor y así poder seguir con una mejor estabilidad económica junto con su esposo.
texts.en: Esmeralda, 37 years old, lives in her own house together with her husband. She has had a store for the last 15 years. She is a kind, responsible, and determined person with a desire to get her family ahead. A few months ago she requested a loan from INTEGRAL to be able to buy more products for her store, and in that way she was able to supply more things, the demand of the customers expanded, and with the sales she has been settling the expenses that come up in her home. Esmeralda is again requesting another loan to be able to buy bulk grains, sweets, candy, sugar, soup, detergent, soap, etc., all wholesale and in that way be able to continue with better economic stability together with her husband.

loans.use: to buy bulk grains, sweets, candy, sugar, soup, detergent, soap, etc., all wholesale.

loans.name: Sokheng's Group

texts.en:
Sokheng is 47 years old and married with four children, and lives in a wooden house with her family members in a rural village of the Phnom Proek district.  She and her husband have earned a living for 12 years by planting cassava.

This is a group loan for Sokheng’s group of two, who are female. She is just with VisionFund for this cycle and is leading her group to seek a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more crops for a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Dúo Dios Es Mi Pastor Group

texts.es:
DUO DIOS ES MI PASTOR
Este dúo está conformado por Brenda ella es originaria de Sumpango Sac, es casada y madre de familia Brenda se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos necesita comprar hilo por mayo para poder realizar blusas típicas, es la primera vez que solicita un crédito con kiva y promete cumplir con los pagos, ya que el sueño que ellas tiene es de poder algún día ver a sus hijos terminar sus estudios con la ayuda de kiva.
texts.en:
DUO DIOS ES MI PASTOR [DUO GOD IS MY SHEPHERD]
This duo is formed by Brenda. She is native to Sumpango Sac, is married, and is a mother. Brenda works in the production and sale of traditional fabrics. She needs to buy wholesale thread in order to be able to make traditional blouses. It is the first time that she requests a loan with Kiva, and she promises to fulfill the payments, since the dream they have is to someday be able to see their children finish their studies with the help of Kiva.

loans.use: to produce and sell traditional fabrics.

loans.name: Samai's Group

texts.en: Samai is a villager from a rural area of Battambang province who supports her family by planting and selling cassava. This is the family's main source of income. Samai and her husband also do rice farming to make additional income to feed their two children, who are under school age. As they are short of working capital to transplant the crops, Samai decided to request funds from VisionFund to buy cassava seeds and reserve some money to pay for crop maintenance. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase profits to feed the family with nutritious food.

loans.use: to buy cassava seeds and maintain crops

loans.name: Sreymao's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural village located in the Phnom Proek Province’s Battambang District, Sreymao is 40 years old and married. She has three children, two of whom are still in school. For the last four years, she has been growing cassava to support her family. Sreymao also sells grocery items to supplement the income. 
Sreymao is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Sreymao wants to use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice fruitfully, so as to sell it for a good price to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland.

loans.name: Saroun's Group

texts.en:
Saroun is 30 years old and resides in a rural village in the Battambang Province’s Moung Russey District in Cambodia. She is married and has been farming rice and growing pineapple. Together, they can earn about 50,000 KHR per day from the current business and can save about 30,000 KHR each day for future needs.  

This is the first loan for Saroun with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is leading her group to ask for a loan. She will use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her family’s business and to gain more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Lab's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Lab is 25 years old and married with three children. She earns a living through farming rice to feed and support her family members. Having been in this business for seven years, she is able to earn about 34,000 KHR per day and manages to save about 12,000 KHR each day for future needs. 
Lab is the second cycled client with VisionFund; she completely paid back the previous loans. She smartly used the loans to make her living gradually improve. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend for labor. She hopes to make more rice so as to earn more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Ngy's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Ngy is 38 years old and married. She has five children. To support the family, she and her husband have been farming rice and working for others for a fee for 11 years. The current business earns her family about 31,000 KHR per day to meet her family’s needs. 
Ngy has been a member of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for two cycles already; she successfully used the past loan to better support her family with sufficient food. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her agribusiness.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland

loans.name: Cosme Vinicio

texts.es:
Al noroccidente de la Provincia de Pichincha se encuentra el Cantón San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del amor un lugar de clima cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora, el mismo es muy visitado por turistas nacionales y extranjeros a disfrutar de las maravillosas cascadas y hosterías en las que se pueden pasar un buen momento en familia o con amigos. 
En este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio el señor Cosme un hombre luchador de 44 años él es soltero tiene un hijo el cual ya es mayor de edad he independiente, él se dedica a la producción de ganado para carne aprendió de este negocio en su niñez junto con sus padres a este negocio le dedica un promedio diario de 8 horas, se encarga de forma personal no tiene quien le ayude, solicita el crédito para invertir en el negocio para pagar la limpieza que se hace cada año en la finca. 
Con esta nueva inversión espera mejorar sus ingresos económicos ya que podrá tener en mejores condiciones su ganado, el señor Cosme agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
In the northwest of the province of Pichincha is the Canton of San Miguel de los Bancos.  This canton (town) is a place of love, a warm humid climate full of friendly, hardworking people.  It is visited by domestic and foreign tourists to enjoy the beautiful waterfalls and lodges where you can spend a good time with family or friends.

It is in this canton that Cosme lives and has his business.  He is a fighter of 44 years old, a single man who has a son who has come of age and is independent.  He is engaged in the production of beef cattle.  He learned this business as a child along with his parents and to this business he devotes a daily average of 8 hours.  He does the work himself and does not have help.  

He is requesting a loan to invest in the business to pay the cleaning that is done every year on the farm.  With this new investment, he expects to improve his income as it will provide a better condition for his cattle.  Cosme thanks the Alternative Foundation and Kiva for the support and the opportunities provided.

loans.use: to clean up as he does every year at his cattle ranch.

loans.name: Samai's Group

texts.en: Samai is 35 years old and married with two children who are under school age. To feed her small family, Samai and her husband grow cassava to sell. Samai is not new to VisionFund. She has used her previous loans wisely; the income earned has been put toward home improvement to make it more hygienic. This time Samai leads a group of six female members, including herself, to apply for another loan. She hopes to use her portion to purchase kitchen appliances and suitable clothes for her kids.

loans.use: To purchase kitchen appliances and clothes for her children

loans.name: Ra's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Ra is a 43-year-old married mother of two children. Rice farming has been the main source of her family’s income for 15 years. To better support the family and earn more income, her husband works as a paid worker. Together, they can earn about 70,000 KHR per day to meet their family’s needs. They manage to save about 50,000 KHR each day for future needs. 
Ra’s group consists of two members who have been with VisionFund for three cycles and completely repaid their loans. The past loans have helped Ra to better support her family members. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan. Ra, who is the leader, wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland and use a portion of it to pay for labor. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthily, and also hopes to make more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Sameng

texts.en: A resident from Kampong Cham district's Kampong Cham province, Sameng, is 35 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. Rice farming is the family's primary source of income. To make additional income, they sometimes catch fish for sale. The money earned is spent on daily food and school fees for her child. Having not enough money, Sameng is requesting a loan from VisionFund to get a decent house for her small family.

loans.use: To get a decent house for her family

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Kampong Cham District

loans.name: Sreymom's Group

texts.en: Sreymom is 30 years old and a villager from the Moung Russey district. She is a married mother of three young kids. She strives for a living from rice farming, which is her single source of income. This is the first loan for Sreymom with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. She forms a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her rice crop.

loans.name: Ana Irlanda

texts.es:
Ana de 59 años de edad,  no estudio. Esta casada, su pareja trabaja en venta de ropa (negocio propio). No tiene hijos y nadie mas vive con ella. Solamente depende de ella la mamá, pero no vive con ella. 

Ana posee un negocio de ropa, lo ha hecho por unos 25 años y lo aprendio por iniciativa propia y decidio hacerlo para poder tener un mejor ingreso economico y asi poder comprar un terreno para construir su propia casa.

Antes trabajaba como comprador de moneda extranjera. La distancia a su lugar de trabajo esta como a 2 km y viaja en bus. En el negocio se involucra su esposo y su horario es de 6:00 am a 12:00 md. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar ropa para damas y caballeros para vender, el prestamo le mejorara su negocio porque podra comprar por mayoreo y asi podra obtener mayores ganancias y por consiguiente su calidad de vida sera mejor. 

Sus sueños son poder tener un negocio mas fuerte en un local con buena ubicacion geografica. El prestamo le ayudara mucho porque tiene la oportunidad de seguir luchando, para asi tener un mejor futuro. Las ganancias las utiliza para cubrir sus necesidades economicas y para ir pagando el préstamo porque asi puede aspirar a seguir trabajando con los préstamos de Credicampo.
texts.en:
Ana is 59 years old and lacks education. She is married, and her partner works at selling clothing (his own business). She has no children and no one else lives with her. She has only her mother, who does not live with her.

Ana owns a clothing business, and has done so for 25 years.  She learned self-initiative and decided to do this in order to have a better economic income and thus be able to buy land to build her own home.

Before, she worked as a buyer of foreign currency. The distance to their place of work is within 2 km and she travels by bus.  In this business, she and her husband are engaged and work from 6:00 am to 12:00 noon.

The loan she is requesting of CREDICAMPO is to buy clothes for men and women to sell. The loan will improve her business because she can buy for wholesale and so may earn higher profits and therefore her quality of life will be better.

Her dreams are to have a stronger business premises with good geographical location. The loan will help a lot because you have the opportunity to keep fighting for a better future as well. Income will be used to meet their financial needs and to pay down the loan so she can hope to continue working with Credicampo loans.

loans.use: to buy clothes for men and women to sell. The loan will improve her business because she can buy for wholesale and so may earn higher profits and therefore her quality of life will be better.

loans.name: Rigoberto Antonio

texts.es: Rigoberto de 50 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia; el se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, el comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, el quiere invertir en insumos agrícolas pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas herramienta, etc. y así continuar con sus cultivos y tener junto con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is 50 years old and lives with his family group in his own house. He earns a living through agriculture, specifically by growing corn and beans. 

He's been working in this sector for many years, which has been very valuable experience that allows him to get the best crops. The terrain he cultivates is located in an agricultural zone. He sells in all the surrounding areas and already has many regular customers. 

He wants to invest in agricultural inputs but needs capital, and because of this, he's seeking a loan from Integral. This will allow him to buy seeds, compost, insecticide, fertilizers, pest control tools, etc. and thus continue his crops and have, along with his family, better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, insecticide, pest control tools, etc.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Tenorio tiene 63 años de edad, es casado, sin hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural que está ubicada en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Tenorio se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como patos, gallos, gallinas, pollos, pavos, cuyes, cerdos, etc; con más de 15 años de experiencia, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio, él Solicita préstamo para compra de más animales y para comprar alimento de engorde de los mismos; dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad en animales, dado que se incrementará su stock para poder de esta forma poder atender los diversos gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona, cuenta con cliente fija y además Tenorio ya ha tenido con Edpyme Alternativa dos préstamos de 500 y 1000 nuevos soles, los cuales los ha cancelado de manera puntual, y debo recalcar que su negocio ha crecido significativamente gracias al apoyo que se le ha y por ende su calidad de vida y al de su familia también.
texts.en:
Tenorio is 63 years old, married, and has no children.  He lives with his family in a rural area that is located in the district of Oyotún, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque, north coast of Peru.

Tenorio is dedicated to the breeding and sale of animals, such as ducks, roosters, hens, chickens, turkeys, guinea pigs, pigs, etc.  With over 15 years of experience, his business is located in the same household,.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of more animals, and to buy food for fattening them.  This investment will help him to to have more variety of animals.  This is in order to increase and meet the different tastes and needs of customers in the area.  He has loyal customers and also Tenorio has had with Edpyme Alternative two loans of 500 and 1000 soles, which were paid in a timely manner.  

It is emphasized that the business has grown significantly thanks to the support he has and therefore the quality of his life and that of his family too.

loans.use: to purchase more animals and to buy food in order to fatten them; this investment will serve to increase the variety in animals.

loans.name: Sokkoeurn's Group

texts.en: Sokkoeurn is 23 years old and a villager from Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She is a married mother blessed with one child who is too young for school. She has managed five hectares of rice farming as the main source of income and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. Never having borrowed from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before, Sokkoeurn has formed a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor cost. She highly hopes that she can double her yield.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to pay for labor cost.

loans.name: Misael Carlos

texts.es:
El señor Misael un joven luchador de 20 años es soltero no tiene hijos vive en casa de sus padres, él trabaja de forma independiente en su propio negocio, con el mismo se paga sus estudios y también ayuda para la economía de su casa, se dedica a la producción de panela de este negocio aprendió junto con sus padres en su niñez, siempre le estará agradecido a su padre por todo lo que le ha enseñado y que hoy le está sirviendo de mucho, trabaja un promedio de 6 a 8 horas por día. 
El señor Misael vive y tiene el negocio en el recinto 10 de agosto un lugar de clima cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora este recinto es muy visitado por turistas nacionales y extranjeros a disfrutar de gran variedad de flora y fauna silvestre. 
Solicita este crédito para invertir en la compra de herramientas de trabajo, con esta inversión mejorarán sus ingresos económicos y mejorará su nivel de vida, el señor Misael agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
Misael is a tenacious 20 year old. He's single, has no children, and lives in his parents' house. He works independently in his own business, with which he pays for his studies and also helps with his household's economy. 

He earns a living making panela, a raw sugar product, and learned this business, together with his parents, during his childhood. He's always grateful to his father for everything he's taught him, and that it's serving him so well today. He works an average of 6-8 hours per day.

Misael lives and has his business on the premises of 10 de Agosto, a location in a hot, humid climate full of friendly and hardworking people. This location is very well-visited by national and foreign tourists to enjoy the large variety of forest flora and fauna.

He's seeking this loan to invest in the purchase of work tools. With this investment, he will improve his income and improve his standard of living. Misael is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and opportunities provided.

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Amka Tujenge Group

texts.fr: Badhera est conseillère du groupe de crédit Amka Tujenge, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 52 ans, mère de 12 enfants, qui tous vont à l’école. Elle a commencé son petit commerce avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est changeur de monnaie (Cambiste). Son conjoint est un homme d’affaires. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Badhera is a the advisor of the loan group Amka Tujenge. She is a client of the microfinance institution Hekima and the 52-year-old mother of 12 children, who all go to school. She started her small-scale business with funds from her husband. She is a money changer. Her husband is a businessman. Badhera would like to obtain more loans to increase her sales and provide schooling and food for her children. In conclusion, she thanks Hekima for supporting unbanked entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to continue her commerce as a money changer

loans.name: Manuel Ernesto

texts.es: Manuel de 30 años de edad, vive en casa propia con sus padres y su hija, el se dedica junto con su padre a la agricultura y con las ventas que realizan de sus productos e que salen adelante con los gastos del hogar, Manuel está solicitando a INTEGRAL  un crédito para poder mandar hacer un portón  y cerrar con malla ciclón la parte de enfrente de su casa que es la que muestra la fotografía, porque con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder comprar lo por esa razón solicita dicho crédito y asi pueda comprar los materiales necesarios como la malla ciclo, hierro, lamina, pago de mano de obra, etc. para que el y su familia puedan vivir cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Manuel is 30 years old, lives in his own home with his parents and his daughter.  He and his father are dedicated to agriculture and sales of their products.

In order to get ahead with the household expenses, Manuel is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to make a gate and install cyclone fencing in the front of his house that is shown in the photograph.

What he earns is not enough to buy and for that reason he is requesting the loan.  With it he can buy the necessary materials such as cyclone mesh, sheet metal, pay labor, etc..

With this, he and his family can live comfortable and safe.

loans.use: to buy cyclone fencing, sheet metal, laminates and payment of labor, etc.

loans.name: Wariti Group

texts.fr: Kavyavu est une brave commerçante et membre d’un groupe d’affaires « Wariti », senior  entrepreneur, dynamique, âgée de 52 ans et mère de 8 enfants, tous  étudient. La cliente est vendeuse des pagnes. Elle installe ses marchandises dans le marché central de la ville.  Elle commença ses affaires avec l’assistance de son mari. Son conjoint est un enseignant. Plus tard, elle bénéficia le  prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 20 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 80 pièces de pagnes. Ainsi, elle souhaite augmenter son capital, construire une maison, scolariser, et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, surtout; pendant ce moment critique post conflits à l’Est du pays.
texts.en:
Kavyavu is a good and honest merchant and member of a business group called “Wariti”. A senior entrepreneur and energetic, she is 52 years old and the mother of eight children, who are all in school. This client is a vendor of ’pagnes’ (the colorful cloth of western Africa). She sets up her merchandise at the town’s central market. She started her business with assistance from her husband. Her husband is a teacher. 

Later on, she benefited from a loan from the microfinance institution Hekima. She has been in this business for twenty years. This new loan will be used to purchase 80 lengths of ‘pagne’ cloth. Thus, she would like to increase her capital, build a house, and provide schooling and food for her children. 

In conclusion, she thanks Hekima very much for promoting autonomy for unbanked women entrepreneurs, especially during this critical time post-conflict in the country’s east.

loans.use: to purchase 80 lengths of 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Pon's Group

texts.en:
A father of six children, Pon is 61 years old and lives in Moung Russey district of Battambang province. He tackles his family hardship via rice farming and his paid-work job during his spare time. This business earns him about 27,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

This is the fifth loan for Pon with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). He has repaid back his past loan wisely, and it has improved his lifestyle gradually. Now, he teams up in a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, he will spend his entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor fees and reaping costs. He hopes that he can make triple the income he did before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to pay for labor fees and the reaping cost.

loans.name: Sokunthea's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Battambang province, Sokunthea is 42 years old and has three children. For her entire family, one hectare of rice cropping and her paid-work job are the main sources of her income. This business earns her about 42,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

This is the fifth loan for Sokunthea with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid back her past loan completely, and she can improve her business as well as her living conditions at a gradual pace. Now, in a group of two, she is a leader. For Sokunthea, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy rice seed and potash for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy rice seed and potash for her crop.

loans.name: Plan De Dieu Group

texts.fr: La Cliente Marie Jeanne est une commerçante  d’une expérience de 5 ans, âgée de 30 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants, qui tous  étudient. La cliente est membre d’un collectif d’Affaires «Plan de Dieu». Elle est vendeuse divers habillements mixtes. Elle installe ses marchandises dans un magasin de la place. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre son activité. Elle va acheter des pantalons, chemises, jupes, Singlin, sous vêtements, vestes etc. Elle démarra ses affaires avec le fonds  reçu de son mari. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite accroitre son crédit, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, en leur accordant de microcrédit, pendant, ce moment post conflits dans la région de l’Est du pays.
texts.en:
This client, Marie Jeanne, is a merchant with five years of experience. She is 30 years old and a married mother of two children, both students. This client is a member of the business collective “Plan de Dieu”. She sells a diveristy of clothing for men and women. She sets up her merchandise at a local store. 

Marie Jeanne is requesting a loan from Hekima to grow her business. She is going to purchase pants, shirts, skirts, “Singlin”, undegarments, jackets, etc. She started off her business with funds from her husband. 

For the future, she would like to increase her borrowing and provide schooling and food for her children. She thanks Hekima for supporting unbanked women entrepreneurs by according them micro-loans during this time post-conflict in the country’s east.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, skirts, “Singlin”, undegarments, jackets, etc.

loans.name: Rit's Group

texts.en:
A mother of 11 children, Rit is a villager from Battambang province, where her rice is grown. The one and a half hectares of rice cropping has returned her about 20,800 KHR (Cambodian riles) per day. 

Rit, a returning borrower who had three past loans from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) with successful repayment, teams up in a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for labor costs. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Ngon's Group

texts.en:
Ngon is 62 years old and married. She has seven children and resides in Battambang province. She strives for a living via rice cropping on a one hectare area and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. 

Ngon is in her fourth loan cycle with this loan. She has completely repaid back her loan and now she forms a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for plowing fees. She highly believes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for plowing fees.

loans.name: Keim's Group

texts.en:
Keim is 39 years old and married. Battambang province’s Moung Russey province is her residential area, where her crop is grown as well. She has been involved in the current business for 11 years, earning about 36,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) as current income. 

Keim, who has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for the past three loan cycles and has repaid back her past loan completely, forms a group of three to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for plowing fees. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for plowing fees.

loans.name: Kimheng's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from the Bovel district of Battambang province, Kimheng is 51 years old and the mother of two children. Currently one of her children is in school. She is the leader of this group.

Kimheng earns a living via cassava, maize and soybean farming. She supplements her income via rice farming. She has been involved in this business for 9 years. 

She decided to take out another consumption loan at the same time as her business loan, with the same group. She will use her entire loan portion of this loan to buy school materials for her kids and a household appliance for her family. 

She hopes that she can gain a better yield from her farming in the future.

loans.use: To buy school materials for her kids and to buy a household appliance for her family

loans.name: Naichan's Group

texts.en:
Naichan, 33, is the mother of five children residing in Kampong Cham province. She supports all of her children as four are in school and one is under school age. 

To struggle for a living, she grows cassava on two hectares of farmland and grows rice on another hectare of farmland. She has been involved in this business for 12 years, earning about 41,000 KHR per day. This is not the first loan for Naichan and she has repaid her past loan completely. 

Now she has teamed up with a group of four to get a new loan. As the leader, she will use her entire loan portion to buy herbicide and to pay weeding fees. 

She really hopes to be able to triple her income now.

loans.use: To buy herbicide and to pay weeding fees.

loans.name: Sokra's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Kampong Cham province, Sokra is 34 years old and married. 

She has been involved in her current farming business for several years, earning about 27,000 KHR per day.  

Sokra is a fourth-cycle borrower who has fully repaid her past loans with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she is now forming a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will use her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide, and to pay for labor costs for her crop. 

She hopes to make a lot more income than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide, and to pay for labor costs for her crop.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 63 años de edad vive con su hijo, su nuera y su nieto en casa propia. Ella posee una tortillería en su lugar de residencia, ya tiene muchos años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues tiene un excelente servicio, es muy amable con sus clientes siempre tiene una sonrisa en el rostro para ellos, además tiene gran agilidad para la elaboración de las mismas y los atiende en poco tiempo. Dora es muy dedicada en su trabajo, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor para seguir con la elaboración de las tortillas. Ella tiene la esperanza que de esta forma le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Dora is 63 years old and lives with her son and grandson in a house that she owns. Dora has a tortilla stand in her house. She has had the business for a number of years and has many customers as the service is excellent: Dora is very friendly with her customers and is always smiling. In addition she is very talented at making the tortillas and serves customers very quickly. Dora is very dedicated to her work and is applying for a loan from "Apoyo Integral". This loan will allow Dora to buy corn in bulk and to continue making tortillas. Dora hopes that this will give her family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk.

loans.name: Ercilia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ercilia de 71 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado de educacion básica, esta acompañada. Su pareja trabaja la agricultura, tiene 4 hijos pero no viven con ella, ya tienen sus propios hogares, pero tambien trabajan. Con ella viven 2 nietos.

Ercilia trabaja con ganado bovino (repasto) lo ha hecho por mas de 4 años y lo aprendio de su esposo y de unos amigos que la motivaron a trabajar, tambien cuenta con un ingreso de la elaboración de flores de papel y asi mismo hace pan para vender. Antes se dedicaba a la venta de gallinas y venta de frutas. La distancia donde tiene el ganado esta como a 1 km y viaja a pie. Las otras actividades economicas las tiene en su casa. Le apoya su esposo y los nietos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar ganado de repasto, el prestamo le mejorara su negocio y su calidad de vida porque tendra mejores ingresos economicos. La necesidad satisfecha es que puede comprar de una vez y asi poder repastar para tener mayores ganancias. 

Sus sueños son poder seguir trabajando con CREDICAMPO, para tener financiamiento para su negocio y en cuanto a sus nietos que estudien y se preparen academicamente.
texts.en:
Ercilia is 71 years old and has a third grade education. She has a partner who works in farming. Ercilia has four children but they do not live with her; they have their own homes and work. Two grandchildren live with Ercilia.

Ercilia works with grazing, bovine cattle and has done for over four years. She learned this work from her husband and some friends who encouraged her to work. Ercilia also earns a little income from making paper flowers to sell. Previously Ercilia made a living selling hens and fruits. Ercilia's cattle are kept at a place one kilometre from her house; she arrives to work on foot. Ercilia does her other work in her house. She receives support from her husband and grandchildren.

This loan from CrediCampo will be used to buy grazing cattle. This loan will improve Ercilia's business and quality of life because she will have a higher income. With this loan Ercilia can buy the cattle in one payment and have the cattle out to graze so that she may earn a higher income.

Ercilia's dreams are to continue working with CrediCampo in order to have financing for her business. With regards to her grandchildren, she wants them to study and be academically educated.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 28 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace vario años, su principal siembra  es el maíz, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controle de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía y asi poder seguir con sus siembras y tener junto con su esposos una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: This borrower is 28 years old and lives in her family home with her husband, a builder. The borrower has been working in farming for a number of years. Her main crop is corn. She sells her products in the area surrounding her home. The borrower is applying for a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure, anti-disease treatments and more, and to improve her land (shown in the photograph). With this loan she can continue with her seeds and enjoy more financial stability with her husband.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure, anti-disease treatments and more, and to improve her land.

loans.name: Ana Veronica

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Colorados, un sector muy agradable por su gente y clima, además por ser un sector muy productivo vive Ana, una señora de 35 años, quien tiene un hijo el mismo que le acompaña todos los días ya que actualmente vive separada de su esposo hace varios años. Ella ha sido madre y padre para su hijo y gracias a su trabajo ella ha podido salir adelante.
La señora Ana es una mujer que le gusta trabajar, todos los días trabaja vendiendo ropa interior y pijamas, recorre vendiendo a clientes de su sector, ya es muy conocida y tiene varios pedidos, con los créditos pequeños comenta que ha podido crecer en su negocio.
Cuenta con una pequeña casa en terreno de su madre, desde que tiene a su hijo a construido de a poco su vivienda para darle un techo a su pequeño, ahora acudió a Fundación Alternativa por referencias del sector, se le aprobó un crédito el mismo que lo invertirá comprando más mercadería para surtir su negocio y poder seguir creciendo.
Agradece enormemente a la institución y a todos quienes conforman Kiva por este aporte que le ayudan a crecer personal y profesionalmente.
texts.en:
In the city of Santo Domingo de los Colorados - a place made pleasant by its people and its climate, and with a strong commercial area - lives 35-year-old Ana. She has a son who lives with her as she has now been separated from her husband for a number of years. Ana has been both mother and father to her son and, thanks to her work, she has been able to get ahead in life.

Ana is a woman who likes to work. Every day she works selling underwear and pyjamas. She goes to see her customers in her local area; she is well-known and receives many orders. With little loans, Ana tells us that she has been able to expand her business. 

Ana owns a small house on her mother's land. Since the birth of her son, she has been building her home, little by little, so as to put a roof over her son's head. She has now come to "Fundación Alternativa" from recommendations from locals. She has been approved for a loan that she will invest in more merchandise to stock up her business and continue expanding it.

Ana is extremely grateful to "Fundación Alternativa" a to all those who make up Kiva for this support that will help to grow both as a person and as a professional.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise and to be able to stock up her business.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Don Ricardo de 57 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia, vive junto con su grupo familiar en casa propia, él es muy trabajador, se dedica a ser agricultora su principal siembra es el maiz. Don Ricardo desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Ricardo, 57 years old, is a very responsible man with his family obligations, as he is known for offering the best to his family. He lives with his family in his own home. He is very hardworking, he works in agriculture, his main crop is corn.

Ricardo wants to increase his sales and that is why he came to the INTEGRAL office, to request a loan which will allow him to buy manure, fertilizer, pesticide, herbicide, etc. He would like to have the assistance requested since he has no other monetary income and thus he will continue to put food on the table for his family without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, pesticide, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Sulma Yaneth

texts.es:
Sulma tiene 29 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de dos hijos. El esposo de Sulma trabaja desempeñandose como operador de maquinaria, mientras sus hijos van a la escuela, Sulma solo estudio hasta bachillerato.

 Ella actualmente tiene su propio negocio y es una venta de ropa, ella lucho por seis meses y quien la motivo fue una hermana y decio hacerlo para no depender tanto de su esposo y ademas tener un ingreso economico extra.

 Sulma necesita el crédito para comprar mas ropa de hombre, mujer y niños. Con el préstamo mejorara en la venta de ropa porque podra comprar por cantidad y por lo tanto conseguira mas rebaja en los productos, asi obtendra mas ingresos y podra tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia. 

Sus sueños son adquirir mucha experiencia en esta actividad y poder ampliar su negocio y contruir una habitación a sus hijos y que sigan estudiando, el préstamo le ayudara mucho porque podra trabajar sin problemas y con las ganacias ir cancelando el préstamo para tener oportunidad de mas creditos.
texts.en:
Sulma is 29 years old, married and the mother of two children. Her husband works as a machinery operator, her children go to school, Sulma only studied up to the high school level.

She currently has her own business in clothing sales, she has struggled for six months and one who encouraged her was her sister and she decided to do it so as not to rely so heavily on her husband and also to have an extra income.

Sulma needs the loan to buy more men's, women's and children's clothing. With the loan she will improve her clothing sales because she will be able to buy in bulk and so she can purchase products at discount, so she will get more income and she will be able to have a better quality of life for her and her family.

Her dreams are to get a lot of experience in this sector and be able to expand her business and build a home for her children, and that they will stay in school. The loan will help a lot because she will be able to work without problems and with the earnings to pay off the loan, and thus be able to take out more loans in the future.

loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Mairol Nicolas

texts.es:
Mairol es es joven trabajador, soltero, tiene 21 años de edad y vive en Pachacamac junto a su familia.
Su mayor motivación en la vida es su familia, es por ello que lucha día a día para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Desde hace más de 1 año trabaja como Operario en una empresa prestigiosa y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajador y siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace.
Mairol está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprarse una laptop para que pueda realizar su trabajo con más eficiencia y así obtener buenos resultados y más adelante poder obtener un ascenso. Gracias a ello seguirá esforzándose para poder cumplir un gran sueño en poco tiempo: "Abrir su restaurante e independizarse".
texts.en:
Mairol is a hard-working young man. He is 21 years old, single and lives in Pachacamac with his family.

Mairol's greatest motivation in life is his family. It is for them that he fights every day, in order to give them a higher quality of life. For over a year, Mairol has been working at a prestigious business. The work is going well because he is very responsible, hard-working and always puts in a good effort at whatever he is doing.

Mairol is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, with the support provided, he will be able to buy a laptop in order to work more efficiently and have better results. This will lead to a promotion further down the line. 

Thanks to this loan, Mairol will be able to achieve his big dream - of opening a restaurant and being independent - in a short period of time.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María es una señora separada, tiene cuatro hijos, dos de ellos ya tienen su familia y los últimos viven con ella, actualmente los dos están estudiando. Todos habitan en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los  Colorados, ciudad caracterizada por ser el puente terrestre que une a las regiones del país. 
María es una señora muy alegre y carismática, ella todos estos años ha visto la forma de sacar adelante a su familia ya que es padre y madre para sus hijos, por ello por las mañanas presta sus servicios de ayudante de cocina en un restaurante y por las tardes vende cosméticos y artículos del hogar, recorre por su barrio y sectores aledaños todo esto por llevar un sustento a su hogar.
Ha trabajado muy duro durante este tiempo, cuenta con su casita propia a quien la ha ido mejorando poco a poco, ahora con este crédito ella adecuará un departamento en su vivienda para arrendarlo y generar otra fuente de ingresos para poder seguir dándole la educación a sus hijos.
Se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo de Fundación Alternativa y de Kiva por hacer posible este crecimiento.
texts.en:
María is separated and has four children; two of her children now have their own families, while two still live at home and are studying.

All of the family lives in the city of Santo Domingo de los Colorados, a bridge between the country's different regions.

María is a happy and charismatic woman. She has found ways to help her family to get ahead, as she is both mother and father to her children. In the mornings, María works as a kitchen helper at a restaurant, while she sells cosmetics and household goods in the afternoons. For these sales, María goes round the local barrio and neighbouring areas in order to support her household. 

María has worked very hard. She has her own house that, little by little, she has renovated. Now, with this loan, she will set up a granny flat in her home to rent out and generate another income to continue providing her children with an education.

María is very grateful for the support from "Fundación Alternativa" and Kiva, who are making her personal growth possible.

loans.use: to build a granny-flat in her home to rent out and have another source of income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, floor bricks, sand and gravel, and to pay labourers to lay the brick floor in her home.

loans.name: Ne's Group

texts.en:
A villager from Tbaung Khmum district of Kampong Cham province, Ne is 40 years old and has four children. Nowadays, she needs only to support three kids: one is in school and two are helping with the family business and the household chores. 

To fight the family’s hardship, her family does agribusiness via rice cropping and soybean farming. She has been with this business for several years and now it returns her about 37,500 Cambodia riels (KHR) per day. This is the fourth loan for Ne and the first loan for her co-borrower. She has repaid her past loans completely and it has upgraded her lifestyle from before. Now, she leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for both her cash crops. She highly hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for both her cash crops.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar de 33 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus 3 hijos de 16, 14 y 9 años de edad. Él es un hombre tenaz que se gana la vida trabajando en un taller de enderezado y pintura cercano a su localidad desde hace dos años. Además su compañera de vida apoya la economía familiar con su negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos. Oscar desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que como podemos observar en la fotografía este se encuentra bastante deteriorado, por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Oscar, 33, lives with his life partner and three children aged 16, 14 and 9. He is a tenacious person and has been working in an auto repair shop close to home  for two years. His partner contributes to the family’s economy by selling clothes and shoes.

Oscar wants to change the roof of his house, which is in bad conditions, as the picture shows. He is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood and nails to change the roof of his house.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood and nails to change the roof of his house.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José de 28 años de edad vive con su esposa, su hijo de 3 años de edad y su abuela. Él es un hombre trabajador que desde hace 3 años se gana la vida como electricista en una empresa, además su esposa se dedica a la venta de pupusas y tamales actividad que realiza los fines de semana en su cantón. José desea legalizar la escritura de su terreno, es por ello, que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para pagar los trámites necesarios para legalizar la escritura de su terreno y así contar con un lugar propio donde vivir.
texts.en:
Jose is 28 years old and lives with his wife, his 3 year old child, and his grandmother. He is a hardworking man, and for the past three years he has made a living as an electrician for a company. His wife makes a living selling pupusas and tamales, which she sells on the weekends in their canton.

Jose wants to legalize their land title, which is why he is asking FUSAI for a loan. He will use the money to pay for the necessary procedures needed to legalize the land title, and therefore have his own space to live.

loans.use: to pay for the legal procedures needed to obtain the title for the land he lives on with his family.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es: Julián de 52 años de edad vive con su hija de 17 años de edad y su grupo familiar. Él es un hombre trabajador que desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la elaboración de ladrillos, actividad que realiza en un cantón cercano. Julián desea comprar ventanas y puertas para su vivienda, ya que como se observa en la fotografía estas se encuentran dañadas. Es por lo anterior que Julián solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: puertas y ventanas para su vivienda, y así lograr darle una mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Julian is 52 years old and lives with his family, including his 17 year old daughter. He is a hardworking man, and for a long time he has made his living making bricks, an activity that takes place in a nearby canton.

Julian wants to buy windows and doors for his house, which, as you can see in the photograph, are currently damaged. It is for this purpose that Julian is asking FUSAI for a loan: to buy doors and windows for his house, and therefore be able to provide greater security for his family.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows for his house.

loans.name: Neth's Group

texts.en: One of the breadwinners in a family consisting of two dependent children, Neth is a mother in her early 30s who struggles to make a living via cassava and sesame farming. She has had this business for two years. With VisionFund (Kiva’s field partner), she is a third-time borrower for this cycle, and has fully repaid her past loans. Now, in a group of four, she is a leader. For Neth, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, to pay for labor costs and to pay for reaping costs. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before so that she can replant her crop seasonably.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, to pay for labor costs and to pay for reaping costs.
